drops.name: Greater Heights
drops.creatorInfo: Melbourne based entertainment artist trying to bring daily joy to the digital world one post at a time.
drops.description: Breathe new life into the city, where once a forest full of life told its story now written with the ashes it left behind but we remember it for what it was and we try to be ok even though we fall from such great heights only to land on something much greater

drops.name: A New Era Begins
drops.creatorInfo: After more than 60 years away from Formula One, Aston Martin returns to Grand Prix racing in 2021 as the Aston Martin Cognizant Formula One™ Team. With one of the most iconic emblems in the world above its garage, and the marque’s legendary British Racing Green adorning its cars, a team of almost 500 passionate men and women sits at its heart – working tirelessly to elevate Aston Martin’s rich heritage into global motorsport success.
drops.description: As a modern team with a strong heritage, we’re excited to be the first Formula One™ team to offer a new way for our fans to own a unique piece of our history. The collection of NFTs we’re making available capture the very first moments of the team’s return to grand prix racing after an absence of more than six decades.

drops.name: Wellerman Story 2021
drops.creatorInfo: Jonathan Monaghan is a visual artist whose whimsical and surreal computer animations have been shown at The Sundance Film Festival and The Palais de Tokyo among other major venues. His work has been featured in several media outlets including The New York Times and Vogue.
drops.description: Sea shanties became a global, viral phenomenon in 2021. Nathan Evans, the former postman from Scotland, is the man who has brought the most successful sea shanty — The Wellerman — to the world. This collaboration features Nathan coming together with noted visual artist Jonathan Monaghan to create The Wellerman Story, 2021.  Just as Nathan has achieved with his song that has been a #1 hit in nine countries, the collection paints a vivid tale of transformation that represents the story of Nathan’s life so far.

drops.name: Lottery part I
drops.creatorInfo: K Camp is an Atlanta-based recording artist and songwriter whose hits Lottery (Renegade), What's On Your Mind, Money Baby, and Comfortable, have held him as a household name in hip-hop for over half a decade. His creative collective and record label, RARE Sound, stands on the cutting edge of culture and digital innovation.
drops.description:
K Camp’s Lottery became a viral hit synonymous with co-creation immediately upon its release as dance teams, weather men, and stars of all kinds moved and created alongside the song. Following an official music video with over dozen choreographers and dancers, the Internet-shattering ‘Renegade’ dance by Jalaiah Harmon, 34-million-plus videos created using the song’s audio, Fortnite emotes, and hologram dance partners, Lottery is everywhere and continues to push viral boundaries.

On the two-year anniversary of Lottery’s release the record has now gone Platinum and brings a reminder: Fame and fortune are often a roll of the dice, whether in music, Internet fame, or crypto goods. K Camp’s Lottery collection is full of RARE surprises and never-before-heard songs.

Art by @Jaygohh, a New York-based designer and animator.

drops.name: Game of Cryptothrones
drops.creatorInfo:
**Ari Hersch** is a self-taught artist born in Johannesburg, South Africa. Hersch attended the renowned Greenside Design Centre Collage where he received multiple awards and accolades on various architectural and design projects. After receiving his degree with distinction in Interior Architecture and Design, **Hersch** was headhunted by South African Architect and designer Mokena Makeka to work at his Cape Town based office. 
\
He has been passionate about art since a very young age after studying and learning about artists such as Gerard Sekoto, George Pemba, and Ben Macala. His style, subject choice, and works are still heavily influenced by these masters today. He has had works featured in groups and solo exhibitions at key galleries and shows in South Africa, including Arts on Main and the Johannesburg Turbine Art Fair. 
\
**Hersch** cannot be confined to a single medium. He mixes formats, experiment with various materials and constantly aim to innovate. His skillsets are constantly evolving while using a number of mediums such as pencil, pen, charcoal, water colour, acrylic, oil paint and now digital. **Hersch** enjoys pushing the boundaries and is currently experimenting with the use of technology in the artistic space.
drops.description:
"*Game of CryptoThrones*" is the story of a medieval country's civil war belonging to Apes... 
\
When the story begins, a decade-long summer is ending, and winter looms as characters battle to claim the "Crypto Throne", the seat of the king of the Crypto Kingdoms, the regime that rules all but the northern tip of Blockchain Landing.
\
This collection features open editions of **The Bitcoin King**, **The Ethereum King**, and **The Cash King**; buyers of these NFTs will be entered into lucky draws to win BTC, ETH, and USDC, respectively. The more editions that are sold, the bigger the prize pools will be!

drops.name: Thoughts from Pandemic Times
drops.description: This collection of thoughts come as the result of feelings during and after the quarantine lockdown. Thoughts about sex, time, space, and those invaluable and funny memories that arise during a shower... Yes, that billion-dollar idea while you wash your dishes. Raw thoughts with zero decorations that come from blank paper to final animation. Art!

drops.name: Your Token Boy
drops.creatorInfo: Boy George is an iconoclast in every sense of the word. From the worlds of pop music to Broadway and beyond, his unbridled creativity has been leaving its mark on the world for decades and he continues to push boundaries as an award-winning musician, visual artist, and cultural provacateur.
drops.description: Your Token Boy is the first-ever collection of NFTs from the iconic and singular Boy George. It ties together his output as both a musician and visual artist in a unique collection that captures the breadth of Boy George's creative flair. An accomplished painter, Your Token Boy features NFTs that span past and present as experienced through the most enduring songs of Boy George's career, expressive portraits of pop icons and bandmates, and more.

drops.name: Collage Mirage: Morysetta
drops.creatorInfo: Morysetta, by her real name, Larisa Murariu, is a self-taught digital collage artist from Romania. She discovered digital collage at the beginning of December 2018 and has managed to amass a following of 250k on social media. She uses space and surreal scenery to create a new reality that subsides in her mind. Her inspiration comes from day to day thoughts and feelings, the artwork is a visual representation of emotions that can be difficult to express through words. Her biggest satisfaction comes through emotionally connecting relating to other people through her work. Although just at the beginning of her career she has worked with a large number of clients, including Warner Records, her main activity being creating cover artwork.
drops.description: A series of quarantine thoughts. Produced during the pandemic, the artwork comes from the artist’s personal feelings of dealing with loneliness, mortality, loss and deception— and her place in the world amidst all that’s happening. The artist uses her work to escape, understand, and empower. These 5 artworks are a fragment of her everyday thoughts.

drops.name: A Journey with the Dogg
drops.creatorInfo: An Entertainment Icon, Snoop Dogg has reigned for more than two decades as an unparalleled force who has raised the bar as an entertainer and globally recognized innovator. Snoop defines entertainment history. An award-winning entertainer, Snoop Dogg has released 19 studio albums, sold over 40-million albums worldwide, reached No. 1 countless times on Billboard charts internationally and received 20 GRAMMY® nominations.
drops.description:
This collection "A Journey with the Dogg" brings together Snoop Dogg’s memories from his early years with art inspired by the NFT movement including an original track “NFT” — an instant classic that is inspired by the movement.

A portion of the proceeds will support young, emerging artists in the crypto space as well as Snoop’s Youth Football League.

This drop is available for only 48 hours.

drops.name: Out of this World: Cosmos Astro Art
drops.creatorInfo: A lifelong amateur astronomer, Cosmos ventured into astrophotography 7 years ago when he first pointed a camera through the eyepiece of his telescope. From that moment his obsession has been to capture the wonders of the universe through his backyard telescopes and astro-landscape photography, obtaining highly detailed images of the Moon, planets of the Solar System, deep space objects and stunning nightscape scenes. His work has been featured in several online and offline publications, including NASA's social network profiles and has collaborated with several institutions including the Argentine Association of Astronomy and the Buenos Aires Planetarium.
drops.description: Space withholds the secret to our existence. Contemplating into distant stars and galaxies we're compelled to wonder about the deeper meaning of life.

drops.name: Bitcoin is Not a Crime
drops.creatorInfo:
For more than a decade, Thierry Guetta, under his moniker, Mr. Brainwash, has been pushing the envelope of contemporary art. The orchestrated collision of street art and pop art has been his balancing act.

Mr. Brainwash rocked the art world with his innovative and fearless style. He uses elements from pop art’s past and the raw components of his street art beginnings to create larger-than-life exhibitions and collaborations. Mr. Brainwash’s imaginative construction of gallery exhibitions and art shows throughout the world has continued to attract the attention of critics and celebrities alike.
drops.description:
The best ideas are the ones that are called dangerous but inspire hope.

Remain open to all possibilities.

In partnership with Aerial, a percentage of the proceeds will be allocated to high-impact, emerging technologies such as Charm Industrial that capture carbon from biomass waste and permanently store it underground and to forest conservation projects verified by American Carbon Registry.

drops.name: All Night Long
drops.creatorInfo: Klarens Malluta is a self-taught Visual Artist, creating something new everyday, since 2017. Being in the fourth year of everydays, his goal is to make 10+ years of everydays, to make his work more valuable in the future. His style is considered retro-futuristic, vaporwave, glitchy and trippy, but he likes to explore and create subjective creations that can make you feel something.
drops.description: International superstar Lionel Richie has a discography of albums and singles that are second to none. His music is part of the fabric of pop music; in fact, Richie is one of the only songwriters in history to achieve the honor of having #1 records for 11 consecutive years. Having sold more than 125 million albums worldwide, this collaboration between Klarens Malluta and Lionel allows fans to own iconic moments from Lionel's career including art based on two never before published images and inspirational dialogue from the legend himself.

drops.name: Collage Mirage: Mooncrab
drops.creatorInfo: Mooncrab is the alias of visual artist Emma Rodriguez. Based in Bristol, England, she studied printmaking and evolved to use digital tools to create collaged landscapes that are like portals into another world. Recreating texture and depth as skillfully as one might approach making physical prints, Mooncrab’s digital art blurs the line between technology and craft to create her visions of fantastical, otherworldly realms.
drops.description: Mooncrab creates work that usually comes together naturally, with some trial and error. There isn’t much of a process that leads up to a final piece; instead, there is exploration. That’s what makes them so fun to make, there’s plenty of play that goes into the work. Mooncrab’s art is inspired by surrealism and outer worlds that defy our reality. The purpose is to create something that makes you feel the opposite of a cloudy Monday morning.

drops.name: BITTERSWEET
drops.creatorInfo: I'm a digital artist from India with over 4 years of experience. I like to use my imagery and creative concepts to give the viewers a visual treat. I mostly create Photoshop compositions, dark and dramatic atmosphere, defines my work.
drops.description:
Bittersweet consists of compositions that gives a feeling of pleasure, tinged with sadness and pain. 

These compositions invite viewers to dig deeper and explore a moodier undercurrent of bittersweet stories of love, loss, beauty and desolate.

drops.name: Light of the Dark
drops.creatorInfo: Hello, I'm Murat Akyol. I create digital art. I turn my imagination and dreams into a work of art in the digital environment.
drops.description: This drop contains four unique pieces. To illuminate the dark world I took inspiration from planets.

drops.name: An Especially Iconic Drop
drops.creatorInfo: Axel Mansoor is a singer/songwriter and Third Culture Kid known for leveraging technology to build community and intimacy with his music. His songs have taken him from a Daytime Emmy nomination to collaborations with the biggest brands in the world, Spotify’s Viral 50 Chart, to your television screen as he pitched a song to H.E.R. on NBC's Songland, and now your phone screen as the smiling face of the Clubhouse app icon. He is also the creator of the app's popular Lullaby Club: a nightly musical experience where your favorite artists sing you, and the rest of the world, to sleep.
drops.description: After separating with his partner of 9 years, singer/songwriter Axel Mansoor left Los Angeles to get some perspective. He traveled home to Mauritius, an island off the Eastern coast of Madagascar, to visit family and wait out the COVID-19 pandemic. However, stuck on an island without a community, Axel found himself exploring the drop-in audio platform Clubhouse and began singing the world to sleep via his "Lullaby Club". In just a few weeks Axel became the app's first breakout music star and was asked to be face of the Clubhouse app icon itself, resulting in his face being placed on millions of phones worldwide. These tokens incorporate that now “iconic” photo taken by Los Angeles-based photographer Zach Bell (@zachbell1212 | zachbellmedia.com) and were designed by multi-media artist Kent Yoshimura, known for his large scale murals and experiential work with brands such as Fear of God, P. Diddy, and the toy store CAMP (@kentaro | Kents.world).

drops.name: Fading Memories: Part II
drops.creatorInfo: **Sean Foley** is an Australian street photographer based in Hong Kong. His photography captures moments of solitude within a chaotic urban environment with imagery based around vibrant neon signs and gritty dystopian landscapes.
drops.description: Part 2 of my "*Fading Memories*" series, which documents the increasingly rare neon signs of Hong Kong, showcases 3 photographs taken in 2018. Lately, Hong Kong has been losing its neon signs at an alarming rate and it won't be much longer before scenes such as these will only be able to be appreciated in a documented form. My goal is to show how electric the atmosphere of Hong Kong was, while they were still around.

drops.creatorInfo: KLOUD is an electronic producer & artist that merges timeless electronic sounds with modern production elements; sonically inspired by darker techno/house, electro & analog synthesizers.
drops.description: Foreshadowing his upcoming EP titled ‘1093’, KLOUD has partnered with visual artist, Alex Hooker, to create an audio visual project representing elements true and raw to only KLOUD himself. Showcasing KLOUD’s iconic logo as the center piece in each piece, the visual is timed to match the audio elements of each single. Each piece has an indirect story built within the render itself, ingrained in every pixel, there are clues to bridge information for the viewer to discover.

drops.name: Out of this World: Hashmukh
drops.creatorInfo: Motion Graphic Designer | 3D Artist. Creating his own style of fun and colorful 3D collectibles. Featuring his Zlorp series, which hosts his fun and whacky world of characters and environments. Each NFT features a unique Zlorp with a colorway and pattern that is generative meaning no two are ever the same!
drops.description: This collection 'Zlorp Vision' is all about the Zlorp Universe and its past! The main piece features an endless loop passing through a TV screen showing some of the past Zlorp pieces! We then have editions piece Zlorp Kid 649, which is floating around waiting to find some new homes!

drops.name: Funky Facepalm
drops.creatorInfo:
Ben Askren is a 2x undefeated NCAA Champion, 4x NCAA Finalist, and 2x Hodge Trophy Winner with 153 wins, 93 of which came by fall— 4th highest in NCAA history.
 
Askren also won the 74kg freestyle weight class at the U.S. Olympic Trials.

Askren later won MMA World Titles in Bellator and One FC, and finished his professional career with a record of 19-2-1.
drops.description: “On April 17th, I’ll be entering the ring Jake Paul, better known as social media superstar Logan Paul’s younger brother. Little Jake started “boxing” — wading into my turf, basically. He got lucky picking fights with a couple of other amateur fighters, so it’s time someone who’s actually been in the game teaches him a lesson. I linked up with SushiNobi to create this drop as a badge of honor for when the bell rings and we all get to revel in Jake catching an L!”

drops.name: Far From Here
drops.creatorInfo:
Emmit was adopted at the age of 1 by the largest whale in the pacific ocean during the golden age when large whales were legally able to adopt small humans. Though no one could understand Emmit, except for the whale and the occasional passing by shrimp, he was able to communicate to his fellow sea creatures through high pitched whale sounds. He was taught at the ripe age of 65 to speak the language “English”. Emmit was then ostracized by the large sea creatures which raised him, and he proceeded to find comfort through music. 

Then he put out some songs, produced platinum selling 'bitches broken hearts' for Billie Eilish, scored two Apple commercials and a TV show for Quentin Tarantino's music supervisor and accumulated over 260 million streams all before his debut album, Far From Here, out April 21st. His website won CSS design awards website of the year. See it for yourself at Prologue.EmmitFenn.com and his new website experience at EmmitFenn.com.
drops.description:
With the release of his debut album, Emmit Fenn partnered with Bertrand Fournier (French Painter) and dotdotdash (Innovation Agency) to create the Far From Here NFT collection - an immersive experience and Emmit’s debut NFT collection. Each song on the album features a limited edition NFT with an audio exclusive interpretation of the full track. 

Collectors of all 10 individual NFTs can receive an exclusive full album sculpture NFT which lives on EmmitFenn.com. 

Sculpture collectors can redeem this NFT for one VIP +1 pass to any Emmit Fenn headline show through 2021.

drops.name: Cognitive Destruction
drops.creatorInfo:
James Lewis is a multidisciplinary British artist, best known for his viral art videos.
He has amassed an engaged global audience of over 4.5M people, accumulating over 1 billion views on his videos. He has exhibited his art, and taught workshops all over the world, and worked with some of the most well known brands on a range of creative projects.
drops.description: Having captured the spirit of the time, the video of James painting this artwork first went viral towards the end of 2020, amassing over 20 million views. Now, James is revitalising his most popular artwork with his first ever NFT drop, which juxtaposes our advancement from the old world, to the new. James will also be offering, for the first time on Crypto.com, a physical art print alongside each NFT purchase.

drops.name: Music For Future Dance Floors
drops.creatorInfo: Beatport is the worldwide home of music for DJs, producers, and their fans. Founded in 2004, Beatport is offering the global DJ and producer community an array of high-quality audio products including full song downloads, exclusive content from leading labels and a streaming music service seamlessly integrated into DJ software and hardware.
drops.description:
This collection, Music for Future Dance Floors, is the world’s first audio-visual NFT compilation; created together with some of the leading global techno and house artists this A/V collection features exclusive, unreleased tracks by Boys Noize, Charlotte de Witte, Pan-Pot, Sasha and a new collaboration between Nic Fanciulli and Alec Monopoly called Sold As Seen plus a bonus track by Sama' Abdulhadi. 

Also featured are new tracks by emerging artists including Alignment, Anna Lann, Risa Taniguchi and Third Son. The music is accompanied by stunning new animations by Berlin-based visual artist Leif Podhajsky who is known for his psychedelic work for Bonobo, Tame Impala and Mount Kimbie. 

This collection features tracks that have been created during the last months at a time when clubs and festivals had to stay shut and to give a soundtrack for a time when we can dance together again— Music for Future Dance Floors!

drops.name: The Ether Takeover
drops.creatorInfo: **Sameer Baloch** is a Digital and 3d artist best known for his work in the film and animation industry for the past 15 years. He is very passionate about his art. His style features dark futuristic fantasies and mind-bending landscapes.

drops.name: Walk With You
drops.creatorInfo: "I'm a 3D artist and educator, known to the community as 'Octane Jesus' thanks to my hair, and a comment that took off in one of my tutorials. I've worked with artists like Beeple, Deadmau5, Zedd, Katy Perry, Keith Urban, and Excision, and I love creating overly ambitious, full CG short films."
drops.description:
Acclaimed digital artist David Ariew (collaborator with Beeple, Deadmau5 and Zedd) has partnered with alternative pop music artist Janelle Kroll (50 million+ Spotify streams and releases with Saint John, Autograf and Michael Brun) to create this collection, and to raise money to fight global warming. All carbon emissions from the drop will be offset, creating a net positive climate impact.
 
The collection includes a full-length music video animated by Ariew that combines photoreal CGI, 3D body scans and facial motion capture with Kroll’s original composition, “Walk with You”. It was directed by Owen Brown (creative direction credits for Bob Moses, ZHU and Apple) and Laura Wass (designs featured by Billie Eilish, Childish Gambino and NYTimes). Additionally, the collection features never-before-seen, limited edition pieces that set Ariew’s visuals over Kroll’s soundscapes.

While exploring themes of connection and impermanence, this body of work also serves as an overarching metaphor for climate change. By posing sculptures in the place of icebergs, “Walk With You” humanizes the imminent threat of glaciers melting and the devastating impact that rising sea levels has on our civilization and loved ones.

As the need to fight global warming has never been greater, this collection was created to take action through art.

The Walk With You drop on Earth Day is hosted on Crypto.com, an NFT platform specifically selected for the low carbon impact of its blockchain, which uses the Proof-of-Stake Cosmos network. All the project's NFT transactions are expected to have significantly less than 1Tn of carbon impact collectively, yet the initiative will offset 100 Tn of CO2 directly via the CarbonDrop.art/carbondrive initiative that artists like Fvckrender, beeple, GMUNK, Reisinger Andrés, Sara Ludy, Refik Anadol, Kyle Gordon, and Mieke Marple helped create. Through this, we'll create a net positive climate impact. Furthermore, part of the proceeds from the drop will be donated to climate related non-profits. It will support the Open Earth Foundation in their work on open digital technology for transparent climate accountability, and Seed Evolution, which supports indigenous women in Peru and Colombia engaging in nature-based solutions to fight climate change through their goal of planting 5000 trees to benefit over 1000 families.

drops.name: Shooting Stars
drops.creatorInfo: It’s been a nonstop run for Bag Raiders since their self-titled debut, including the multi-platinum hit Shooting Stars. Shooting Stars morphed into the ubiquitous meme resulting in over 3 billion streams, renditions by Will Smith to Katy Perry, and status as a legendary piece of internet history.
drops.description:
For the first time in history Bag Raiders have teamed up with All Ski Casino, the original creator behind their legendary Shooting Stars meme. Together, the pair are offering an NFT of one of the most iconic pieces of internet history - the original video behind the meme, uploaded on All Ski Casino’s Youtube channel in 2017. 

In addition to unique ownership of the meme, one additional NFT owner will cement themself as an iconic part of Shooting Stars’ legacy - the first owner of this NFT will work directly with All Ski Casino to design and publish their own version of the meme. This will be the first version of the meme created by All Ski Casino since the original upload on his Youtube in 2017, and will be the first video publicly uploaded to the channel since the original meme.

A limited run of animations from All Ski Casino’s original video are also collectible as NFTs.

20% of all proceeds will be donated to nonprofits supporting music education in Australia.

drops.name: Quarantine Dreams
drops.creatorInfo: Felipe Posada / The Invisible Realm is a Visual Artist and Creative Director. His art uses a combination of mediums ranging from CGI, digital photography, scanned vintage imagery and illustration. Conceptually The Invisible Realm encompasses a body of work rich in cosmic symbolism infused with a kind nostalgia reminiscent of pop art with contemporary undertones. The artist's ultimate quest is to explore the connection between the vastness of the Universe and the depth of the human soul.
drops.description: This series called “Quarantine Dreams” was born a year ago and continued to expand until this day. It depicts a journey’s end in a quest for internal transformation and rebirth. It is inspired by one of my favorite childhood films (The Neverending Story) but it also carries some of the meanings, teachings, and questions I’ve experienced through my own life’s journey.

drops.name: Flavors of Summer
drops.creatorInfo: Nathan Head is a photographer who infuses enticing colours into his photography. Inspired by K-Pop, Anime and City Pop; Nathan brings optimistic, youthful summer vibes to artworks.
drops.description: Allow this collection of colourful artworks to take you on a journey. Your number one destination for warm, summer vibes. Just don’t forget to pack some sunscreen!

drops.name: Dessert Sushi
drops.creatorInfo: First Digital Restaurant, created by Rich.
drops.description:
CryptoSushis is a collection of delectable digital collectibles that are part of a set menu.

The Dessert Sushi collection is a special drop featuring a range of sweet sushi creations inspired by your favorite cryptocurrencies!

In Sushi We Trust.

drops.name: Revolution
drops.creatorInfo: Kaiwan is an aspiring Kurdish digital artist and internationally published photographer. His creations represent an amalgamation of digital art and cinematography that conveys the best of both worlds allowing him to translate his imaginative ideas into a distinctive form of creative self-expression.
drops.description: These artworks represent different stages of a revolution. It all begins with an act that ignites anger at which point people will have had enough. Consequently, chaos ensues to make a statement. In the end, with all of the disorder, something new and beautiful is born and that will be the hope for a better future.

drops.name: The New Era of Calcio
drops.creatorInfo:
The Serie A Championship is the premier football division in Italy and is one of the world's most elite football leagues.

Lega Serie A is the first football league entering the NFT world for the occasion of the TIMVision Cup, 2021 edition of Coppa Italia.

#WeAreCalcio
drops.description:
Lega Serie A is the first football league around the globe to enter the NFT space. 

Commemorating Juventus’ victory against Atalanta after having faced each other for the TIMVision Cup, the collection commemorates this historic match-up.

The trophy has been reinvented by the most important Italian modern artist working today, Diego Perrone, and the 3D model is included in this collection. 

And, 10 random lucky fans who purchase an NFT will win a jersey signed by Juventus and Atalanta players— don't miss the opportunity to become one of the very first owners of Lega Serie A's NFTs!

drops.name: IIHF Legends I
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description: IIHF Legends I is a curated collection of some of the most memorable moments in ice hockey championship match history from our archive of legendary matches. Collect your favorite moments to commemorate the on-ice action, trophy-winning goals, and incredible plays of yesteryear!

drops.name: Adventures In Space
drops.creatorInfo: **Visualdon** is a 3D visual artist from the U.K. He is known for his colorful, retro-futuristic sci-fi loops and animations.

drops.name: Synthwave from Space
drops.creatorInfo: Cyberpunk and Infrared photographer, I'm sharing my passion for Japan and retrowave aesthetics through my original photos. I'm creating NFT to explore new different styles!
drops.description: Senbenito’s 2nd drop on Crypto.com after selling out of his first collection recently is "Synthwave from Space"— a series of original photos taken in Japan and edited in a Cyberpunk / Retrowave aesthetic.   Never before has anyone been able to photograph this strange phenomenon: a mysterious blue light coming straight from space has been sighted in different places in Japan. No one really knows what it is. Maybe some simple rumors, or a new type of distortion in our reality. Who knows?

drops.name: Origins - Sculptures - Part II
drops.creatorInfo: **Panos Pagonis** is a multidimensional creative with over 10 years of field experience in visual, music, and sound design projects. He brings to us his Origins collection, an exploration of primordial cultures re-imaged from a contemporary perspective.
drops.description:
"*Origins*" consists of a limited number of unique sculptures inspired by the artistic artifacts of the early Bronze Age (3300 BCE). Namely, the Mediterranean civilizations, which reached similar cultural and economical heights of our time,  yet collapsed suddenly and in some areas violently. The dark feeling of these statues is representing the terrible ending of these people's cultures.  

This is Part II of the collection, delivering 4 more unique sculptures.

drops.name: Bad TV
drops.creatorInfo:
Ciprian Iacob is a film composer & producer with over 10 years of industry experience, gained through numerous successful projects in Bucharest, Berlin, London, Glasgow, France (Cannes), Los Angeles & New Dehli.
 
Over 3 million listeners to date and past collaborations in projects involving Hans Zimmer & Hashem Al-Ghaili - the biggest science blogger in the world are numbers reflecting his current artist ranking.

His art speaks about meaningful bridges we need to cross in our lives. From the theory of living in a Simulation to having our lives connected to extraterrestrial entities, he seeks to provoke and raise questions on the fundamental freedom which we start to lose piece by piece, every single day.
 
At this point, re-shaping the way consumers interact with film and music content is the main goal for his present and future plans. 
Asset-tokenization through NFT integration, building a content delivery network via blockchain structural databases & decentralized video streaming are major updates coming on board in the nearest future.
drops.description:
Should we believe everything the media is feeding us?
Sex, money & total surveillance of our every move. 
How about we listen more to our inner voice?
Don't be a victim of this attractive yet FAKE reality. 

'Bad TV' is a collection manifest speaking about the side effects of media control.

Buying any collectible from this NFT Drop will unlock access to the Original Score DELUXE Version, which you can download from an IPFS based music streaming platform.

Every NFT comes with a blockchain authenticity certificate, unlocked after purchase.

drops.name: Life of a Spaceman
drops.creatorInfo: Eashan Misra (Mr. Kalopsia) is a self-taught 3D & 2D artist who portrays himself as a passionate spaceman, exploring the universe through his art.
drops.description: What would a spaceman living together with us in our day to day lives look like? Mr. Kalopsia explores that world through his art.

drops.name: Subliminal Decay
drops.creatorInfo: Dizzy Viper is a 23 Year old 3D Visual Artist from Italy who is absolutely in love with Digital Art. He has been creating Daily Artworks for over 4 years, reaching 60.000+ Followers on Instagram and being a big inspiration to many new Artists.
drops.description: A collection of different Forest Artwork in different styles, exploring the variety of possible artwork with one and the same theme.

drops.name: (Un)seen Motions
drops.creatorInfo: clintxvx is a Brazilian artist born in 1990 in the city of São Paulo. Since a child, he has always been connected to several art forms. From pixação, graffiti, mixed media collages and everything that involves street art, to the area of visual communication and art direction, where the roots with the graphic design were stablished.
drops.description:
In his new drop, Clintxvx instigates an (in)conscious and instinctive experience. An attentive look at the details that, although often seen, pass by unnoticed, like tears in the rain. 

How many people actually pay attention to the details that make up a work of art? How many people can abstract the first things that their brain interprets and try to seek another direction in their conclusions?

With this provocation, clintxvx brings even more life to the unseen details through a mix of static and animated collage for the first time in his career, maintaining his unique style, which he calls (un)seen.

drops.name: Origins - Sculptures
drops.creatorInfo:
3D Visuals-Maker
Music & Sound for Media | Paean Audio
Releasing music as PÆN

I am a multidimensional creative with over 10 years of field experience in visual, music, and sound design projects.
I will be offering my rare sculptures collection of Origins through crypto.com. An exploration of primordial cultures re-imaged from a contemporary perspective.
drops.description:
“Origins” consists of a limited number of unique sculptures inspired by the artistic artefacts of the early Bronze Age(3300 BCE). 
Namely, the Mediterranean civilisations of the time, which reached similar cultural and economical heights to our time,  yet they collapsed suddenly and in some areas violently.

The dark feeling of these statues is representing the terrible ending of these peoples cultures.

drops.name: DREAM BUBBLE
drops.creatorInfo:
Natacha Einat is a Digital Artist based in Paris. She creates visual metaphors in deep harmony with nature. Obsessed with growth, she constantly learning to see things from a new perspective, each artwork is a new adventure. Her purpose is to inspire you and feed your imagination.

She was commissioned many times by Adobe to create pieces of art. She also worked in partnership with them to test and highlight new features in Adobe Photoshop. 
She also works with musicians, authors, and brands such as Jim Kwick (Author of LIMITLESS, a New York Times Bestseller) and Fearless Motivation (a music group with more than 500 Million streams).
drops.description:
DREAM BUBBLE is a collection of visual metaphors.

Each visual takes you to a new land, full of magic and hope, to appease your soul and awaken your inspiration.

It is about this moment where we feel deeply connected to what surrounds us.

drops.name: Rejuvenation
drops.creatorInfo: **Mustafa Sherpidin** is a Uyghur 3D artist based in Norway, Oslo. He has been in the 3D field since 2018, and continues his career by creating 3D surrealistic, aesthetic art.
drops.description: This is my first ever official drop partnership. You can see the drop includes diverse styles. Each artwork expresses a different emotion. I personally prefer not to give a definition for my artwork, everyone has their own vision and story that connects them to the artwork. The story behind the artwork is not supposed to be written, it is supposed to let the audience decide for themselves. - **Mustafa Sherpidin**

drops.name: IIHF Legends II
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description: IIHF Legends II is a curated collection of some of the most memorable moments in ice hockey championship match history from our archive of legendary matches. Collect your favorite moments to commemorate the on-ice action, trophy-winning goals, and incredible plays of yesteryear!

drops.name: Your Worst Nightmare
drops.creatorInfo: I am a full-time Krampus mask carver, Illustrator, and Concept Artist from Salzburg, Austria. I find it thrilling to "play" with the fear of the viewer, tell a story with my paintings and make viewers think.
drops.description:
The collection "Your Worst Nightmare" aims to remind you of the conscious and subconscious fears you have likely felt at least once in your lifetime. We are bombarded by "positivity, perfection, and success" messages daily on every possible social media feed. 

I try to shake you up, make you feel something different, and perhaps drive your mind to a place you have not gone before. Enjoy the ride.

drops.name: Excalibur
drops.creatorInfo:
Kagan Okudan, is an LA-based Motion Designer and Director. From an early age, he was heavily
inspired by nature especially with the concept of biomimicry and how we as humans have adapted natural processes to our benefit, with time this attitude turned into a lifestyle for him. Through this approach, he was able to hone and develop his problem-solving skills, which became vital for his work when he was often presented with tight deadlines.

It was during his studies in Vienna, he met his inspirations; Zaha Hadid and Greg Lynn and, it was at this moment he realized his life had changed forever.

Initially, he would explore media forms such as photography, videography and then eventually found 3D design in the end. Afterward, he began studying visual communication design in Istanbul and focused more on motion design and direction.

After spending some time in Istanbul he moved to LA, Kagan would then gain certifications in schools like the school of motion and Gnomon.

Kagan has contributed and collaborated with artists such as Cardi B, J Balvin, and Kali Uchis and worked with brands such as Segway Robotics. He is also a proud member of in-house directors of underscorefilms recently.
drops.description:
The legend of Excalibur was a huge part of my childhood. 

When I saw a stylized painting version from a very talented friend, I decided to recreate the scene in 3D and for sure Excalibur brought me luck. 

This is part of a visual narrative that I have been writing for a while.

Excalibur has been waiting for its owner to be pulled out of the rock and that will trigger the next episodes of the story.

drops.name: Seven Lions: Worlds
drops.creatorInfo:
An electronic music headliner and true innovator, Seven Lions (Jeff Montalvo) has constantly broken rules and musical boundaries to satisfy his creative vision. Credited with pioneering the ‘melodic bass’ sound by bringing trance, dubstep and bass together, Seven Lions has released on Casablanca, Monstercat, Anjunabeats, and OWSLA to name a few, but has since expanded his world through Ophelia Records, his own melodic bass label that has made it through nearly 100 scene-leading releases over the past 3 years, and garnered over 350 million streams on Spotify.

Acclaimed for merging music artistry with an ethereal fantasy world centered around its heroine Ophelia, Seven Lions creates a rich landscape of fictional narratives using sound, visuals, and artwork he calls Mythos.
drops.description:
This first NFT offering from Seven Lions features five locations within the expansive mythology of Seven Lions and the story of Ophelia. Visualizing this fantastic world is long-time illustrator, Munich based artist, and graphic designer Evelyn Abermotion. Evelyn has been a prominent figure in bringing this lush and expansive world to life with her intricate and atmospheric fantasy landscapes and sceneries.

Abermotion has been part of the entertainment industry as a designer and art director for over a decade, working on movies like Julie Delpy‘s The Countess as well as the incredibly successful Angry Birds game series.

While the original pieces were created as artworks for 5 past Seven Lions songs, they have been re-imagined and re-animated by long time Ophelia Records animator Robert Kohler, who is a 3D artist and motion designer out in San Diego, CA. He works fulltime as a 3D Artist/Motion Designer at 2K Games.

drops.name: DreamHackMasters_finalfinal_2.mp4
drops.creatorInfo:
Artwork by Nicolas Chaussois. 

From detailed and realistic to cartoonish and simple, Nicolas always experiments to keep things fresh and explore graphic styles.

Deeply passionated with Esports since his discovery of Starcraft 2 competitions, capturing the most intense moments of a tournament victory with portraits and compositions, he has ever since  combined his new passion with his craft to deliver intricate and colorful depictions of the greatest players.
drops.description: A collection of DreamHack Masters memories that can never be repeated.

drops.name: Ethereal World
drops.creatorInfo: I am a Dutch fine artist and to me, art's highest purpose is to entertain, to enlighten, to inspire, to evoke emotion and to change an audience in some way, big or small.
drops.description: Allow me to show you Planet Earth through my eyes. Each NFT from Ethereal World features a unique value: Enlightening, Serenity and Eternity!

drops.name: SCROLL, SCROLL!
drops.creatorInfo: Jesu Moratiel is a Spanish multidisciplinary artist. His work explores the impact of digital technologies on our everyday ecosystem, as well as the influence of ancient civilisations and science fiction on contemporary culture. Using new digital techniques in an expressive way, he brings together art, technology, humanity and artificiality. He is represented by MTart Agency London and Paris.
drops.description:
SCROLL, SCROLL! IS A DROP THAT BRINGS TWO SPECIAL PROJECTS, THE MUSIC BODY TEXTURES SERIES AND THE EXAMPLE PROJECT, THE FIRST DIGITAL MAUSOLEUM OF THE WORLD.

This drop deals with textures in the digital context. Those new digital "skins" serve here as textures that expand through the bodies of the works and through the space.

Using the interface of Spotify, the drop deeps in the dissolution of the digital and physical borders, the digital aesthetic as a fundamental part of our current imaginary and the overflow of the massive consumption of information.

The use of these applications is not random: the applications that Jesu Moratiel uses  are a kind of cartography or mapping, each in its own territory: Spotify has become the new Alexandria library of music, a work of art in itself.

drops.name: Collapsing Reality
drops.creatorInfo: Cyberpunk and Infrared photographer, I'm sharing my passion for Japan and retrowave aesthetics through my original photos. I'm creating NFT to explore new different style!
drops.description: "Collapsing Reality" is a series of original photos edited in a cyberpunk / glitchy aesthetic. What would be our life in the future, when the real world will be linked to virtuality, artificial intelligence and new technologies. What would happen if a bug occurs, does the wolrd will collapse? What if everything was just a simulation? Who knows...

drops.name: Back to the Roots
drops.creatorInfo: Gastón Carballal is an Argentine digital artist who sculpts his works in virtual reality, which allows him to maintain the plasticity and gestures of the hand, giving his creations a unique style. He is a set designer and professor of art history, that is why in each of his works there is always hidden a tribute to great masters of art and sculpture.
drops.description:
In this series of works painted in virtual reality, the wind passes through a forest and shapes the roots.
Three poems with three stories that begin and still do not end because art always leaves more questions than answers.

drops.name: Beautiful Mess
drops.creatorInfo: Digital artist from Italy.
drops.description: The collection "beautiful mess" is about the beauty and the burden of human interaction in all of its complexity.

drops.name: The Tarogramma Archive
drops.creatorInfo:
Damien Cifelli is an award-winning multi-disciplinary visual artist who has exhibited internationally. Each of his NFTs serve as artefacts from the fictional world of Tarogramma, a place that lives in parallel with our own world. It is a hidden place that explorers have been searching for for centuries; it is believed by some to be an inaccessible forgotten city, others to be the afterlife, and many to be completely fictional. The images function as visual storytelling, similar to a novel or a movie. Images may be objects, portraits or scenes representing the daily lives of inhabitants of Tarogramma. There are recurring characters, icons, clothes, locations and specific artefacts. Each piece has its own unique story that adds to the Tarogramma universe.

Created with traditional techniques such as drawing, oil painting and sculpture; they are converted into NFTs to tell the story of a world both similar and alien to our own.
drops.description:
The first ever drop of Tarogramma artefacts in unique NFT form; these objects are drawn from the Tarogramma Archive; a vast collection of images and objects that explore the universe of this fictional hidden world. 

The first drop is inspired by the events of recent years seen through the prism of Tarogramma; ‘Breathe’ - a public information poster for a pandemic, ‘Priest of The Void’ - an example of a grave marker for a leader of Tarogramma’s major religion, and ‘2020’ - a painting that expresses the inhabitants of Tarogramma’s feelings towards that year in particular. 

Collectors will have the opportunity to own these artefacts and images - pieces of an alternative world, and be a fictional archeologist, uncovering new elements of the Tarogramma universe as they are released.

drops.name: Château Noir
drops.creatorInfo: Thomas Dubois is an Award-winning artist, Director and Art director. From a young age, Thomas has developed a passion for creation, art and storytelling. His background is in architecture, but his passion for creation led him to produce a wide variety of visuals, award winning projects and scenarios.
drops.description:
What would be your dearest wish today? If seven fairies would come and bless you with their promises, what would you ask for? If it is wealth, what kind of wealth it is? Maybe it is grace or beauty then we should ask ourselves what does beauty really mean to us?

Château Noir is a reinterpretation of the Sleeping beauty tale seen through the prism of our time. We should not be fooled by the apparent simplicity of myths and fairy tales. Though they come to us from a long past, the depth and beauty, marvel and terror of these earliest stories are echoing the challenges of our time where digital is king.

Château Noir highlights the courage of a woman. Her willingness to face challenges, to face solitude, to face the obstacles as well as her internal demons in order to answer a question that we can all ask ourselves: Who lies hidden deep within us?

You can discover more of the project on my website and social media.
This drop is the first one for this project. It includes 3 animations.

drops.name: Crystal Fantasy
drops.creatorInfo:
Tony Lopez is a French videographer that has been touring on big festivals across Europe for rappers. He created his own style mixing live reports with 3D animations and high-quality video editing.

With covid and lockdown, he has been pushed more into 3D and started creating dreamy environments with a surreal style.He found with 3D a beautiful way to express his creativity and to open the minds of others.
drops.description:
This "Crystal Fantasy" collection contains 4 surreal visuals, mixing beautiful environments with living beings. 

It's all about opening your creative minds and appreciating the fantasy worlds. Every visual has been worked with the producer @jstbenmusic to create more immersive pieces with the audio part. It contains the 'Crystal Ballet', an audio-visual work that is beautiful and expresses freedom, and 3 others visuals that are perfectly looped with animals and environments. You'll find a Skull visual with jellyfishes, on a dark theme, an enchanted forest with big ladybugs, and a white sand planet with a character animated on a bicycle preserving the environment.

drops.name: Don't be distracted
drops.creatorInfo: micc si an Italian artist who loves to harmfully provoke others with the intent to originally trigger thoughts in those who observe the works. The working method is enriched and influenced by his Art Director background in the field of advertising. The latest works are characterized by the use of the 3D technique, self-learned by the artist.
drops.description:
'Don't be distracted', is not just the name of micc's first drop on crypto.com, but a warning, a piece of advice that the artist wants to give us. 

The drop consists of four well-distinguished 3D Visual Art, each of them unique in color, technique and message. What the artist really wants to communicate with this drop is a clear message: don't be distracted, don't rush, relax and understand these images and why they were created. The primary phase of awakening is doubt, so it's up to you to decide whether to stay asleep or start doubting what is right or not.

drops.name: Random Eternal Memory
drops.creatorInfo:
Digital Art Creation became acclaimed with it’s YouTube channel Success with almost 300k subscribers & 12 Million views within a short period of time. 

Sasikumar, the artist behind Digital Art Creation, changed the course of modern digital vector art by developing an innovative method of using gradients, color blending, and opacity moods to create realistic & painting style “drawings in vector space.” 

Digital Art Creation NFTs are unique. Each individual Tokens has been embedded with a YouTube video link. With these links, you will be able to see the creation of that artwork from start to finish on Digital Art Creation’s YouTube channel. This will ensure the authenticity & genuineness of each NFT.
drops.description:
The collection " Random Eternal Memory " is about taking you on a journey. A journey into my world. A world filled with borderless space, timeless travels, & good vibes. 

I converted some of the moments of my world into artworks. 

Each of these five artworks represent childhood happy vibes, first love, conquering the woods, alien plants, and first contact with extraterrestrial intelligence.

drops.name: OVERDOSE
drops.creatorInfo:
TraumAmnesia is a French VFX/3D artist. It is the first confinement that pushed him to specialize in this field, the 3d having infinite creative possibilities,
he quickly mastered this art and was able to work with brands like Sony, Braun and Porsche.

He recently made NFT platforms his playground, since they finally allow him to create without constraints, and to live fully from his personal creations,
while remaining in the artistic universe that is dear to him.

In a world more and more digitized, he knew how to seize good opportunities for the benefit of his art.
drops.description:
Does he/she spend a lot of time thinking about social media or planning to use social media?
Does he/she become restless or troubled if unable to use social media?
Does he/she use social media so much that it has had a negative impact on his/her job?

Does Social Media affect the Brain? I know that some of you reading this will be concerned...

Welcome to the 21st century.

drops.name: Personality 13
drops.creatorInfo:
« I'm driven by curiosity and the need to live my life to the max.»

Mo Tuncay grew up in Turkey, where he spent hours playing outside, in awe of nature’s colors and figures. After dedicating himself to raising a family, he turned to a new future as an artist. 
Today, his abstract acrylic paintings are dreamlike, expansive, and liberating - powerful expressions held within Tuncay since childhood.
drops.description: For this collection, I was inspired by my last visit to Paris. I visited many old churches and saw beautiful high ceiling paintings. I was totally in trance with some of the works on the ceiling. Because of the height of the ceilings they look like amazing blended abstract works for me. I save that image in my mind and after I used my imagination on canvas.

drops.name: Amigos Collection
drops.creatorInfo: Zigor is a veteran art director and character creator. He is known for his crazy world of characters called AMIGOS. He has worked among other clients for Prada, Nickelodeon, American Express...
drops.description:
Amigos Collection is a dimension created by Zigor where his characters coexist with humans, all this universe is threatened by the magician Rata Pollo who is the one who gives life to the craziest characters. 

It is a series of collectible NFTs, with a game on Discord where you can have fun deciding the future of your own character.

drops.name: Hidden Faces: Dancers of Istanbul
drops.creatorInfo: A film director and artist. His short films ''Golden Shot'' (2015) and ''Avarya''(2020) screened over 250 events and got more than 60 awards. He's become part of an Oscar-qualifying event more than 10 times, such as Atlanta Film Festival, Cleveland Film Festival, and more.
drops.description: "Hidden Faces: Istanbul Dancers" is a series of dancers placed in key points of the city. These points are the most changed, destroyed, or lost regions of Turkey in the last 20 years. Dancers continue to have fun in these areas by refusing this change or adapting to their own way. Because this is what it should be...

drops.name: Crypto.com Dessert Sushi
drops.creatorInfo: First Digital Restaurant | Created by Rich
drops.description: The initial round of dessert sushis seemed to satisfy fans' sweet tooths, but the time has come for the ultimate NFT concoction: an extra-rare Crypto.com dessert sushi!

drops.name: Ancient Trinity
drops.creatorInfo: Crypt Couture interprets cultural artifacts and democratizes the experience one would get by viewing an artifact in real life. Rare but accessible and hyper real.✨
drops.description: Ancient Trinity features three extremely rare artifacts that are reinterpreted from their original form. They all have their own mystical backstory and will only be available here for a short amount of time. As always, high-resolution images and animation for every purchase.

drops.name: Fading Memories
drops.creatorInfo: Sean Foley, or better known as stfeyes, is an Australian street photographer based in Hong Kong. His photography captures moments of solitude within a chaotic urban environment with imagery based around vibrant neon signs and gritty dystopian landscapes.
drops.description: Fading Memories is a series based on the increasingly rare neon signs of Hong Kong. Over the past 5 years, the neon signs of Hong Kong have been systematically removed due to new government regulations regarding signs overhanging the streets. During this time, I have made it my mission to capture these Hong Kong icons and immortalize them before they are gone.

drops.name: FREE DEEP SOUL
drops.creatorInfo:
Camila Nogueira (1993, Portugal) is a digital artist who focuses on reinterpreting reality with a magical vibe and creating surreal worlds we would love to live in. 
Her visual narratives take us to the beauty side and make us look at life with a more joyous and dreamy perspective. Her aesthetic is a transformation of the Japanese woodblock style with comic book influences, as well as Studio Ghibli's animations. Using pastel color and smooth gradients she creates colorful gentle and idyllic scenes inspired by Nature.
drops.description:
We are all free deep soulful creatures tracing our path in this complex world.

Free 
Like Nature, we all have a free spirit inside, that needs to be fed with curiosity, exploration, and adventure.

Deep 
We are more than what we show on the surface.
We are complex creatures that carry traumas, deep feelings, and mysteries within ourselves.

Soul 
We all have a light inside, that makes us unique and with unlimited potential.
Here we store our dreams and the motivation to pursue them.


Which one do you identify with the most?

drops.name: IIHF Legends III
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description: IIHF Legends III is a curated collection of some of the most memorable moments in ice hockey championship match history from our archive of legendary matches. Collect your favorite moments to commemorate the on-ice action, trophy-winning goals, and incredible plays of yesteryear!

drops.name: Dissolved Reality
drops.creatorInfo: Self-made 3D Artist and Motion Designer, aiming to connect abstract themes with harsh reality.
drops.description: This "Dissolved Reality" mini-series is devoted to underline the significance of time and its influence. The main piece is an endless loop of passing over to the "Dissolved" realm and coming back to "life" again.

drops.name: IIHF Snipes
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description:
Crypto.com/NFT and the International Ice Hockey Federation are excited to introduce IIHF Snipes! Collectors can now buy packs containing three memorable moments from the IIHF’s archive of legendary matches.

In total, there are 48 different collectibles commemorating on-ice action, trophy-winning goals and incredible plays from ice hockey history distributed among 501 packs. The game highlights are minted with varying levels of rarity: for some collectibles, 50 editions will be made; for others, only 20; and the rarest will be one of a kind. Generated at random, and available for $100 each, the packs may include any combination of the three collectibles — which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace. 

Don’t miss your shot at owning a piece of IIHF hockey history!

drops.name: Wish You Were Here
drops.creatorInfo:
Melissa Vincent is a self-taught, surreal artist based in Oxford, Mississippi. She has created dream-like visuals born from her Southern roots on an iPhone since 2011 which has lead her to press trips with National Geographic WILD, Northern Ireland to shoot Game of Thrones film locations, selling her art in brick and mortar galleries, as well as working with top brands such as Canon and McDonalds. 

Her work captures the strangeness of the South and combines everyday surroundings with scenes of nature giving her art a unique sense of place.
drops.description:
Wish You Were Here is a collection of digital art created on iPhone featuring the lone tree. 

Standing solo yet still powerful, it breathes life and divine energy into the cosmos.

drops.name: IIHF Snipes II
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description:
Crypto.com/NFT and the International Ice Hockey Federation are excited to introduce IIHF Snipes! Collectors can now buy packs containing three memorable moments from the IIHF’s archive of legendary matches. 

In total, there are 48 different collectibles commemorating on-ice action, trophy-winning goals, and incredible plays from ice hockey history distributed among 501 packs. The game highlights are minted with varying levels of rarity: for some collectibles, 50 editions will be made; for others, only 20; and the rarest will be one of a kind. Generated at random, and available for $30 each, the packs may include any combination of the three collectibles — which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace. 

Don’t miss your shot at owning a piece of IIHF hockey history!

drops.name: SHIKIGAMI
drops.creatorInfo: Concept Artist, Illustrator, and Creator exploring new worlds and ideas. Robert likes to mix cultural tropes and themes with sci-fi and fantasy elements to create exciting and thought-provoking concepts. Along with The Big Five, previous projects include: The Agents of Sin, The Agents of Virtue, and Shikigami. Professional projects include Borderlands 3 and Battleborn at Gearbox Software.
drops.description:
SHIKIGAMI explores Japanese mythology and Yokai lore through a military sci-fi lens. 

The world of Shikigami centers around Yokai teaming up with Onmyouji to protect their shrines and the visitors who come to worship at them. An Onmyouji is an individual who has proven themselves worthy to partner with a Yokai. A Yokai is a supernatural being that represents an element or force of nature. When a Yokai chooses to serve an Onmyouji they gain the title of Shikigami. Though some Onmyouji and Shikigami work for the good of all, others use this powerful bond for personal gain by working as mercenaries, thieves, or assassins for the highest bidder. A delicate balance must be maintained to protect both humans and Yokai in the world of SHIKIGAMI.

drops.name: Twisted Discoveries
drops.creatorInfo: Ahmed Muntasir, known as "Ragenfection" is a freelance 3D artist based in St. Catharines, Canada. Ragenfection predominantly focuses on creating simple nature, surreal, environmental, and sci-fi artworks. Currently, he's a business student at Brock University.
drops.description:
The first-ever drop from Ragenfection features three simple sci-fi artworks with three distinct environments created entirely in 3D. 

Artworks included in the box approaches to inspire viewers to discover the unknown and invite them to invent the new in addition to calm the mind.

drops.name: RGB - A World of Colors
drops.creatorInfo: I am a Dutch fine artist and to me, art's highest purpose is to inspire people by using colors in order to enhance certain feelings. Welcome to my world full of colors.
drops.description: As an artist, I dream of RGB. I can't live without colors, they speak louder than words. Colors can enhance a feeling, change behavior and it evokes emotion. A world of colors is a series of art pieces which have their own unique values.

drops.name: Humans Infecting Ourselves
drops.creatorInfo: Sergi is an artist from Barcelona, Spain. He specializes in different variants of art, including surrealism and concept art. His goal is to capture raw emotions and true feelings through his work.
drops.description: The main piece presents the manipulation exercised by the society that controls the rest of the people. More specifically to the current global pandemic situation. Something happens behind there. This is a series of social injustices waiting to find new homes!

drops.name: Esoteric Moment
drops.creatorInfo: Lordneutron is a Brazilian 3D artist who is passionate about animation and esoteric arts. His greatest quality is to bring universal feelings and laws to his concepts.
drops.description:
This collection ''Esoteric Moment'' is about the energies of the universe, the laws that the universe brings to human beings. 

There are 3 art pieces that contain a lot of meaning and symbols that represent our esoteric world.

drops.name: Roaring Currents
drops.creatorInfo:
”I never think that I'm an artist. I just create artwork because I love it.” 

Fortunately for Indonesia-based Herri Susanto, other people happen to love his works as well. Herri has grown to become one of the most well-known and respected designers in the game. 

Stunning scenes of nature come together with everyday life in otherwise impossible ways to make pieces that will cause you to do a double-take. Focusing on just a few colors at a time to draw your eye in, Herri’s work proves to be both graceful enough to stand the test of time, and yet unique enough for the inquisitive mind in all of us.
drops.description: The sea is emotion incarnate. It loves, hates, and weeps. It defies all attempts to capture it with words and rejects all shackles. No matter what you say about it, there is always that which you can't.

drops.name: IIHF Champions
drops.creatorInfo: The IIHF, founded on 15 May 1908 in Paris, France, is the governing body of international ice hockey. The IIHF features 81 member associations, each of which is the national governing body of the sport in its nation.
drops.description:
Canada took home the gold at the 2021 IIHF World Championship finals in a historic match against Finland in Riga, Latvia on Sunday, June 6 — The country’s 21st all-time gold medal at the World Championship and third in the last six years. To celebrate, we’re offering Gold Packs featuring highlights of some of the biggest moments in Canadian hockey history from the past 12 years. 

Each pack contains 3 NFTs of varying rarity: for some collectibles, 100 editions will be made; for others, 30; and the rarest only 5. Generated at random, and available for $30 each, the packs may include any combination of collectibles— which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace.

drops.name: Ethereum Rocks
drops.creatorInfo: Multi awarded, active, exhibiting fine art photographer, mountain obsessed sunrise junkie, clouds adoring rock collector, all year glacier waterfall dipper, winter wonderland magic loving alpine gypsy creating animated and non animated "Alpine Magic Realism" pieces of adventure, peace and freedom of higher grounds.
drops.description: This collection of Ethereum Rocks is about the unstoppable force of the NFT art revolution were creators of all media are celebrating their newly found independence and freedom, both, artistically and economically! Each piece is animated and represents an unique attribute of this historical moment.

drops.name: Retro Futura
drops.creatorInfo:
Bernarda NIBERA Conič (1992) – Master of Arts in Visual Communication Design.

NIBERA is an interdisciplinary visual artist based in Ljubljana, Slovenia. She is a graphic designer by day, VJ and photographer by night, and a film photographer at the weekend. She also created a wide range of new media installations as a nightclub stage designer.

In 2020, she created over 50 album covers for musicians from all over the world. Her creative path started at a very young age. At primary school, the teachers noticed her talent and artistic potential in art classes, and they encouraged her to apply to the school for design and photography in Ljubljana. 

Four years later, in 2011, she graduated in photography. One year later, Nibera studied textile and fashion design and specialized in pattern design and textile printing. 

After getting her bachelor’s degree in (2016), she studied graphic design at the Academy of Fine Arts and Design in Ljubljana and, in 2019, was awarded her master’s degree in Visual Communication Design.
drops.description: This drop contains 3 retro-futuristic audio/visual art pieces created by Nibera. The content of this drop will teleport you back in time and provide you with a multisensory feeling of time traveling.

drops.name: IMAGINARIUM
drops.creatorInfo: His mission is to express as much as possible emotions in each artworks. Every piece of work he creates portrays a different story, emotion and always has a meaning. When people look at his work, he wants them to escape from this world and enter his "Imaginarium."
drops.description: A series of dreamy fantasy worlds inspired by night, darkness, and hope. Created by Aron Visuals as a way to escape from this world and to enter into his Imaginarium. Each subject in the artworks represents dreamers that follow their own path of destiny to the truth of the unknown. Shine your light through the darkness.

drops.name: My Everyday Magic
drops.creatorInfo: Ashraful Arefin is a fine art photographer from Dhaka, Bangladesh. His *Harry Potter* and *Alice in Wonderland* inspired animations & cinemagraphs have caught the attention of millions around the world.
drops.description: The world can be a magical place if you see things with a different perspective and imagination. That was the inspiration behind these pieces. In my work, the usual simple world is a place to dream, to see the magic happening.

drops.name: Day Dreams
drops.creatorInfo:
**Adrian**, known by most as **Rosco**, has been working as a digital artist, specializing in photo manipulations, for nearly 7 years. He's passionate about surrealism and fantasy, but he likes to try a little bit of everything. 

Mainly using Adobe Photoshop, Adrian turns his thoughts and dreams into art, putting all his negative thoughts and frustrations onto a canvas.
drops.description: A series of imagined worlds of surrealism. Made by the professional visual artist **Rosco Adrian** as a way to contemplate and escape the daily thoughts of an ordinary world.

drops.name: Astro Feelings
drops.creatorInfo: **HillyHD**, Italian born, London living **Luca Scabini** is a 3D digital artist and graphic designer.
drops.description: My art has always been about feelings and emotions. The intent with *Astro Feelings* is to connect people through art.

drops.name: The Meteoric Rise Of Doge
drops.creatorInfo:
Psychedelic artist who's creations are owned by the likes of Joe Rogan, Lex Fridman, Pauly D, Cody Gardbrandt from UFC, and Daren Williams from NBA.

**Ugonzo**'s passion for art started at an early age when he copied famous paintings from Vincent Van Gogh and Salvador Dali. They inspired him to take it to the next level. **Ugonzo** started exhibiting his artwork in different galleries across different states of America as well as using different mediums of art.

Documentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fbxd_RdzgQY
drops.description:
"*The Meteoric Rise Of Doge*" collection brings you on a journey to witness the transition of a widely popular Doge MEME into the symbol of status and generational wealth. The collection aims to showcase the intense emotional attachment towards a unique cryptocurrency from the standpoint of "winners" and "losers".

With Dogecoin's holders and overnight millionaires featuring the most diverse demographic of individuals comes an equal amount of envious participants who missed out on these fat juicy gains. The latter are even going at lengths to blame Elon Musk - the Technoking of Tesla - himself for their misfortune of buying high and selling low.

This collection also features a side story of the well-known WallStreetBets stonks, that further expanded the beliefs of "possible financial returns" in our collective consciousness.

"*The Meteoric Rise Of Doge*" holds true historic significance and is designed to bring about unexpected nostalgia towards this unbelievable era, decades from today...

drops.name: The Idea Guide
drops.creatorInfo: **Vollut** is a digital artist who builds his work around comedy and animation. Born and raised in a small city in Russia he developed his career online and was heavily influenced by digitalization and the global web. Being a part of the generation that uses memes to express themselves he found his voice in similar things. That's why you can see a lot of pop-cultural references in his work.
drops.description:
The Idea Guide is a collection that consists of a short film and signed assets associated with it.

Do you ever look at someone and wonder, what is going on inside their heads? The internal battles of restless minds pass unnoticed too often. It's time to glance at this endless confrontation inside a person trying to come up with something. 

The short film was split into 3 logical pieces. Each asset is signed and commented on by the author.

drops.name: YEAR ZERO
drops.creatorInfo: "Living amongst the nature of the Blue Mountains, Australia, I create daily, surreal mindscapes. Spending anywhere from 3-10+ hours a day creating, tweaking, rendering, and imagining these scenes has brought forth beautiful rich details from the natural world. Each minute looking into nature leaves me more in awe of its complexity and intricate patterns of change, I am filled with more and more inspiration and reverence for it all, and am honored to be a part of, and create amongst it." - **Koanye**

drops.name: A COSMOS OF WEIRDNESS - CHAPTER ONE
drops.creatorInfo: Patrick is the founder of **ALT/SHIFT** - a weird little 3D and design studio in Hamburg, Germany. His true passion is creating art. Everyday. Wherever her goes - whatever he does. His pieces try to bend a too often dark and sad reality into something positive and colourful.
drops.description:
This is the first drop for **ALT/SHIFT**s universe of artworks, animations, and weirdness. Art doesn't always have to be sad, dark, and serious. Why not make the world a bit more colorful!? And more fun?
 

This drop includes a Special Edition Giveaway. 

- Purchase all 4 collectibles before the drop ends to be awarded an exclusive 5th special edition NFT.

drops.name: Uncertain Times
drops.creatorInfo:
Enisaurus is a Digital Dinosaur with a computer passioned for Illustration & Animation. His bold geometric style is influenced by his love for great unconventional stories, everything from his childhood, nature, art, and pop culture, but also for the most common things that make life a more interesting and exciting place to enjoy. 

He has developed projects for clients like Adobe, Twitter, DoorDash, Converse, Disney, Shake Shack, Pepsi, Harvard, The Washington Post, BMW or Dropbox.
drops.description: In the collection "UNCERTAIN TIMES", Enisaurus represents his own complex vision of the world we are living in, the evolution of humanity towards a strange future, the complexity of love and hate, the sometimes foggy boundaries about good and bad, and the businesses behind all of that.

drops.name: VGK NFT: The Vegas Gold Collection
drops.creatorInfo: The Golden Knights Creative Team is one of the smaller creative teams in the league, but that didn’t stop them from earning recognition as the NHL Creative Team of the Year in 2020–21 — as voted by their peers at The Torus. The group has also won several Gold ADDYs over the past four years, for projects such as the Henderson Silver Knights logo, Vegas Golden Knights Gold Jersey, Treasure Chest, Season Ticket Member Gift Boxes, the Vegas Born campaign and others. The well-rounded team is made up of Art Director Brady Hackmeister, illustration-focused Matt McElroy, and animation-focused Zachary Ault. The team also manages the Golden Knight’s AHL team — the Henderson Silver Knights — as well as a newly purchased IFL team, two practice facilities, and an under-construction arena.
drops.description:
The Vegas Golden Knights have launched their first collection of collectible NFTs. There is a limited run of only eight VGK NFTs in the inaugural batch, seven of which will be featured on Crypto.com NFT in an auction-based format for a limited time of only 48 hours, starting on July 1. 

In addition to the highly exclusive and limited seven VGK NFTs up for auction, the team will also be issuing 1,500 digital-only versions of the “GOLD DRIP” coin collectible. These will be sold for $50 each and will be available for purchase for a limited 72 hours.

drops.name: The Inexplicable Nature
drops.creatorInfo: **Pulkit Kudiwal** is a self-taught Digital 2D and 3D artist from India who has been creating for the last 4 years. He has been featured by *Hindustan Times*, *Adobe Photoshop*, *Bored Panda*, *Expert Photography*, and many more.
drops.description: The series "The Inexplicable Nature" is a series of exclusive artworks created to show unexplainable formations in mother nature. Each and every piece tells a unique story that everyone can interpret in their own way.

drops.name: 5th Anniversary Mystery Drop
Scars To Your Beautiful
drops.creatorInfo: **Gervisuals** is a world-renowned Spanish digital artist specialized in fantasy photo edits and surreal compositions."The creative adult is the child who survived."
drops.description: "*Scars to your beautiful*" is a series of original photos edited in a realistic and oniric way. They show women empowerment, they are the protagonists of their stories, leading a revolution in contact with nature.

drops.name: The Abyss of Self
drops.creatorInfo: Retro-futuristic digital art created by a surreal artist. Although the main ideas of the projects I do have elements of life, I use more indirect ways to reflect this reality. I prefer retro-futuristic characters and places that do not belong to our world. I have tried to express myself by taking photographs for 8 years and I have been expressing it with digital arts for the last 5 years.
drops.description: "I wanted to combine the various emotions and feelings in life with the self of futuristic characters that do not belong to this world. Everyone's way of telling their story is different, I want to leave you alone with 3 different selves and thoughts." -Yağız Kocabıyık

drops.name: Colby Brock x Heard Well: Genesis Art
drops.creatorInfo:
**Colby Brock** is a social media star who is popular for his work as a Viner and a YouTuber as one-half of **Sam and Colby**. His videos are a mixture of dark and hilarious and garner over 10 million views monthly. 

**Heard Well** is the first music label entirely powered by social tastemakers and their communities. **Heard Well** partners with best-in-class influencers and creators to curate playlists of their favorite emerging artists. Each playlist is released in digital format providing fans the ability to discover new music and enable our clients and the musicians they care about to profit from their artistry. 

Stemming from our clients’ success we have contributed to breaking top artists including *Billie Eilish*, *LANY*, *Lauv*, *ODESZA*, *Duke Dumont*, and more.
drops.description:
