**Colby Brock**, social media influencer and creative, brings you his first ever NFT. 

His career began in the early days of Vine, and has transitioned to YouTube and TikTok where he is viewed by millions every month for his videos that marry the hilarious and macabre. His latest playlist in conjunction with Heard Well, “The Nights I’m Left Alone,” is the inspiration for his Genesis NFT. Created by artist Jacob Hylton with creative direction from Colby Brock himself, Colby hopes that this NFT is as meaningful to you as it was for him to make.

drops.name: Alternative Existence
drops.creatorInfo: **Julian Frener** (aka **Frenerdesign**) is a 3D Artist from Merano/Italy who loves to experiment with 3D shapes and designs. His NFT collection "*Alternative Existence*" leads the viewer into his abstract world of 3D art.
drops.description: The collection "*Alternative Existence*" focuses on unseen and foreign worlds. All three images lead you into different dimensions that seem similar but completely different at the same time. Each artwork conveys a different feeling and emotion and exists on its own.

drops.name: Pr0v3rbs
drops.creatorInfo: **Raidzer0** is an award-winning 3D Designer / Creative Director from London focused on hyper-realistic fantasy animations and matte painting. He is consistently pushing himself outside his comfort zone to explore and transform his work with new approaches. He has created work for brands including Red Bull, Intel, Ford, HP, and Bose.

drops.name: The Dreamcatcher
drops.creatorInfo: Graduating from *Bilkent University* in 2012, studying graphic design, **B166ER** is an Istanbul-based motion graphic designer and director. Obsessed with time and reality, he likes to emphasize these themes in his work.
drops.description: This is a dream in which reality collapses when you hold on tightly. But was there ever any other choice but to hold on? After all, the end of this ruin was just silence...

drops.name: Legends: The Official Drop by AFA x FTI
drops.description:
This series is a tribute to the legends that have given us so many moments of passion, suffering, and joy on the field — unique stars with lights of their own, who have made soccer an art form. 

This is a small tribute to the big star that heads this drop, offered by the *AFA* in collaboration with the *FTI* — in its first official collection of digital art.
 

## Redeemables




Special redeemables will be distributed among all of the open edition NFTs in this drop at random: an official soccer ball signed by Messi and friends from the national Argentina team, an official Argentina jersey signed by Messi and friends from the national Argentina team or an official hat signed by Messi and friends from the national Argentina team. Each item will also come with a photo of Messi and others signing the merch. There are only 5 of each redeemable (5 balls, 5 jerseys and 5 hats), totaling 15 altogether.

drops.name: Lost Worlds
drops.description:
Join **Yo Dojo** as he begins his interstellar voyage capturing surreal moments on distant planets. A story of love, time, and the universe. A prelude. 
 
**Redeemables**
Purchase at least 1 NFT from the drop to be entered in a drawing to win the exclusive 1/1 NFT.

drops.name: Metaphysics
drops.creatorInfo: **Lukas Hahn** is a motion designer, 3D artist, and illustrator based in Berlin, Germany. He explores cyber futurism, human individuality, storytelling, and abstract forms through a range of digital techniques. Lukas strives to diversify his visual language with every image or animation he creates and often questions societal structures and technology through subtle symbolism. Creating art in order to deconstruct his ideas and imagination, Lukas takes inspiration from science fiction novels, movies, and the contradictory cityscape of Berlin itself.

drops.name: A NEWK3D COLLECTION
drops.creatorInfo: **newk3d** is a Norwegian 3D artist creating new art every day. He likes chrome colors & creating art! His work includes a lot of playing with materials, textures, and lighting, and loves experimenting to see if he can create something that's unique.
drops.description: In this collection, I celebrate having created a new piece of art for over 600 days! It was a super tough challenge that has pushed me creatively. I have explored different styles, ideas, and textures. I also recreated an older piece exclusively for this drop. CASCADE is a work based on an older everyday, and I love how it turned out! - **newk3d**

drops.name: Gaia's Origin
drops.creatorInfo: **Palash** (aka **thebandanaboi**) loves to play with natural elements and characters and tries to blend them inside his own sci-fi- surreal reality.
drops.description:
This collection by **Palash** follows the story of *Gaia*, a mutant who has the power to turn anything she touches into nature. In Greek mythology, *Gaia* is the personification of the Earth and one of the Greek primordial deities. 

Each NFT showcases the different acts of the story of origin, namely Relaxation, Reality, and Realisation.

drops.name: The Citizens of Tarogramma
drops.creatorInfo: **Damien Cifelli** is an award-winning multi-disciplinary visual artist who has exhibited internationally. Each of his NFTs serves as artifacts from the fictional world of Tarogramma, a place that lives in parallel with our own world. It is a hidden place that explorers have been searching for centuries; it is believed by some to be an inaccessible forgotten city, others to be the afterlife, and many to be completely fictional.

drops.name: Fantasy Village & Kingdom
drops.creatorInfo: **Vivek Chaurasia** is a digital artist and matte painter from Mumbai, India. He expresses his fantasy worlds through his artworks. His art pieces mainly contain fascinating landscapes which will make you believe in the existence of such places.

drops.name: The Pawfect Mystery Box
Enchanted Realm
drops.creatorInfo: **Bishal Roy** is an artist from India with over 4 years of experience. He likes to use imagery and creative concepts to give the viewer a visual treat. He mostly creates Photoshop compositions, dark and dramatic atmosphere, which defines his work.
drops.description: '*Enchanted Realm*' is a collection of images that invite viewers to explore the fantastical worlds of magic and mystery. These compositions capture drama, emotion, and mystery with color and care.

drops.name: Peanut Butter Jelly Time: The NFT
Gianluigi Buffon - ICON
drops.creatorInfo: **SportsIcon** are connecting fans with the greatest sportspeople of all time through NFTs. For the first time in history, you can own part of your Icon's story.  Athlete curated insights into pivotal moments of their journey through immersive, artistic, inspirational NFTs, unlockable content, and community.

drops.name: Alternate Reality
drops.creatorInfo: **H+ Creative** represents a tight-knit roster of top-tier, diverse, and international artists. We consider our extensive family of curated talents to be the best of the best, and our capabilities infinite. We pride ourselves on the deeply-rooted network we maintain in the creative industry, our presence is universal. We don't believe in restrictions and know that the future is limitless.
drops.description:
"*Alternate Realities*" and otherworldly planes of existence from the limitless talents of **H+ Creative** curated, and represented artists.
\
[Read about each of the featured artists and see a preview of the exhibition-style collection on our blog](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hannah-stouffers-h-invites-nft-collectors-to-an-alternate-reality-7c4acdf57a26).

drops.name: The Vivid Dream
drops.creatorInfo: **Nathan Head**’s colour-rich work captures the mundane in a refreshed nostalgic light. He is inspired by Korean pop music and its accompanying visuals, which is often reflected in his colourful oceans and snapshot style cityscapes.
drops.description:
Snapshots of an unforgettably vivid dream of a journey to a calm and sacred space. Enter the world of **Nathan Head**, where flowers glow with an iridescent shine and waves crash in a plethora of colors.


 


*This drop features a special Collector Loyalty rebate! If you already own one of this creator’s previously released NFTs, receive a 15% credit back to your NFT account in USD within 7 days after any eligible purchase during this drop!*

- *Previously released NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet at time of purchase*

- *Secondary market purchases are not eligible for rebate*

- *Limit three (3) rebates per user*

drops.name: Quarantine Dreams: Part II
drops.description:
This drop is the continuation and conclusion to the story which began with "*Prophecies*".  An ode to personal revelations, transformation, and one person's journey of conquering fear in order to let go and transcend.  

 


*This drop features a special Collector Loyalty rebate! If you already own one of this creator’s previously released NFTs, receive a 15% credit back to your NFT account in USD within 7 days after any eligible purchase during this drop!*

- *Previously released NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet at time of purchase*

- *Secondary market purchases are not eligible for rebate*

- *Limit three (3) rebates per user*

drops.name: Blockchain Totems
drops.creatorInfo: Travis Ragsdale is a 3D artist who has been making art for the past 8 years+. He lives in Dallas TX and creates a wide range of digital art and content. One of his specialties is creating satisfying looping animations that soothe and relax the viewer.

drops.name: FROM THE MEME TO THE MYTH
drops.creatorInfo:
**Jesu Moratiel** is a Spanish multidisciplinary artist. His work explores the impact of digital technologies on our everyday ecosystem, as well as the influence of ancient civilizations and science fiction on contemporary culture. 

Using new digital techniques in an expressive way, he brings together art, technology, humanity, and artificiality. He is represented by the MTart Agency in London and Paris.

drops.name: Drunk Collection
drops.creatorInfo: **TWOJ STARY 997** is an artist from another planet in a different galaxy. After arriving on the Earth, he settled in the capital of Poland specializing in 3D animation. His art shows a humorous way of what surrounds him on a daily basis. His distinctive and colorful compositions contrast with the theme of his works, which is often simply disgusting and repulsive.

drops.name: Weird Stuff
drops.creatorInfo: **Vladyslav Lavrenov** is a CG Artist. Passionate about abstract and procedural art. His work is mostly generative art and simulations.
drops.description:
Weird stuff is a collection of entertaining animations with a short story and ASMR-style sound design.
 

This collection features a special edition NFT raffle. Two buyers for each separate collectible will be selected at random to win a Special Edition 6/6 NFT!

- The NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet when the drop ends in order to be eligible.

drops.name: Other Worlds
drops.creatorInfo: **Marco Zagara** is a creative Visual Artist and Graphic Designer based in Italy, where he continues to grow and evolve a visual portfolio that covers CGI graphics, 2D photo manipulation, and illustration. His work is characterized by a strong visual impact thanks to vibrant colors, interesting points of view, and oniric environments, in which he blends together a strong focus on visual storytelling with a keen use of color and depth to create surreal compositions. Partnering with clients and brands around the globe to solve problems using creative and inspiring solutions, he's continually looking for new challenges and likes to collaborate with people, teams, and companies that are as passionate about what they do as he is.
drops.description:
With the "*Other Worlds*" collection, **Marco Zagara** depicts three different realities that belong to three alternative futures. Whether technological progress will lead us to the evolution of our species, or to the regression to a primordial way of life, or even to abandon our planet to look elsewhere for a place to call home, the human presence will always remain the link between these worlds, without which they couldn't exist.

This collection features a special edition NFT givaway. Collect all 3 pieces from this drop to be awarded an additional NFT from the artist!

All 3 NFTs must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet when the drop ends in order to be eligible.

drops.name: ESCAPISM
drops.creatorInfo:
Who has never dreamed of the moon? In December 2018 **Larisa Murariu**, a self-taught digital collage artist from Romania has landed on it and if you trust her, her dreams are still from up there. Today Larisa’s personal ‘moon’ has the same name and destiny: **Morysetta**, an astronaut of the imaginary. Her cosmic vision focuses on daily objects and common feelings just to turn them into something special, as magic as life is (and the moon itself). 
\
The secret of this great success is in the empathy behind every single collage: within them, human emotions always find - drop after drop - a new place to be, without losing their truth. Rather they gain a deeper meaning: while crossing images they get into the essence of a thought, the pureness of a gesture, the source of an idea, and - surprise! - no word is needed. Is this the power of the moon? This is the world of **Morysetta**.
drops.description:
Don’t underestimate your mind: it can always travel even if you can’t. This is the concept behind **Morysetta**’s drop "*Escapism*", a personal pursuit of freedom in scenarios you can hardly imagine. The result is a new replaced world to explore, a new traveling mind ready to be expanded.
\
In total, there are 7 different escapist collages distributed amongst 121 surprise art packs. These surreal pieces are minted with varying levels of rarity; for most, 20 editions will be made — but one lucky art collector will receive a rare, one-of-a-kind creation. Generated at random, and available for $200 each, the packs will each include 1 piece of collectible art — which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace.

drops.name: MetaGod
drops.description:
What is God? Why is God a Meta presence in our lives? Has this just been Fake News for thousands of years? Yet another form of manipulation ever since we were born?
But we live, we learn, we make mistakes, and eventually end up in a trap with no return. Only then do we rely on a higher force to help us find our way out. 
 

"*MetaGod*" is a collection manifest speaking about the relationship each of us has with God.
 


*This drop features a special Collector Loyalty rebate! If you already own one of this creator’s previously released NFTs, receive a 15% credit back to your NFT account in USD within 7 days after any eligible purchase during this drop!*

- *Previously released NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet at time of purchase*

- *Secondary market purchases are not eligible for rebate*

- *Limit three (3) rebates per user*

drops.name: Ancient Relics From The Future
drops.creatorInfo: With unique 3D artwork that explores the interplay between the real and imaginary worlds, **Enchanted Future**’s fascinating depictions are a fitting metaphor for NFT artwork - where the traditionally distinct boundaries between digital and physical objects are being continually redrawn.
drops.description:
"*Ancient Relics From The Future*” is a collection that tells the story of an alternate timeline. It is a dream of what once will be.
 
*This collection features a special edition NFT raffle. Collect all three pieces from this drop to be entered to win a rare 1/1 NFT!*
- *All three NFTs must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet when the drop ends in order to be eligible.*

drops.name: VIRIDIAN REALMS
drops.creatorInfo: **Dizzy Viper** is a 23-Year-old 3D Visual Artist from Italy who is absolutely in love with Digital Art. He has been creating Daily Artworks for over 4 years, reaching 65.000+ followers on Instagram and being a big inspiration to many new Artists.
drops.description:
A collection of 3 different Artworks showing a mix of Cultural, Science Fiction, and Urban Jungle Environments in a Viridian inspired Colorscheme. 
 
*This drop features a special Collector Loyalty rebate! If you already own one of this creator’s previously released NFTs, receive a 15% credit back to your NFT account in USD within 7 days after any eligible purchase during this drop!*

- *Previously released NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet at time of purchase*

- *Secondary market purchases are not eligible for rebate*

- *Limit three (3) rebates per user*

drops.name: BLOOM
drops.creatorInfo:
**Natacha Einat** is a Digital Artist based in Paris. She creates visual metaphors in deep harmony with nature. Obsessed with growth, she constantly learning to see things from a new perspective, each artwork is a new adventure. Her purpose is to inspire you and feed your imagination.
 

She was commissioned many times by Adobe to create pieces of art. She also worked in partnership with them to test and highlight new features in Adobe Photoshop.
She also works with musicians, authors, and brands such as Jim Kwick (Author of LIMITLESS, a New York Times Bestseller) and Fearless Motivation (a music group with more than 500 Million streams).
drops.description: "*Bloom*" is a collection of visual metaphors, using hot air balloons. The artist depicts the journey of growth, the pursue of our goals, with positivity, hope, and creativity. Today could be the beginning of anything you dream of. You are limitless.

drops.name: Liquid Movement
drops.creatorInfo: **Christian Whiticar** lives in Vancouver, B.C. and loves the great outdoors. When he's not spending his time running around he probably has his head glued to the screen trying to create one of his wild ideas which are running through his head. Christian is loving where digital art has gone and wants to create beautiful and moving work which could someday be presented in digital/virtual galleries.

drops.name: The Few That Remain
The Underworlds: Vol. 1
drops.creatorInfo: Mostafa Khaled is a world renowned visual artist who's neon/sci-fi universe creations have been appreciated by millions. He is touted as one of the most talented digital artists by some of the most respected designers on the planet.
drops.description:
The highly anticipated debut NFT drop from Mostafa Khaled entitled "The Underworlds: Vol.1". This series of limited edition collectibles features some of Mostafa's more treasured work that has never been available exclusively for purchase, until now. Welcome to "The Underworlds".

In total, there are 5 different pieces distributed amongst 50 surprise art packs. Generated at random, and available for $200 each, the packs will each include 1 piece of collectible art — which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace.

drops.name: Hopes & Dreams
drops.creatorInfo: **Davansh Atry** is a self-taught 3D artist using Blender 3D and Photoshop for his creations. He is a fan of bright and colorful lights. His work is inspired by neon lights, film photography, and night photography.

drops.name: 76ers Legacy 01: The Debut
drops.creatorInfo:
As one of the most prestigious and recognizable brands in all of sports with a passionate fanbase, the **Philadelphia 76ers** and Crypto.com are proud to bring to life exclusive and authentic digital collectibles for fans to own, collect and share. The 76ers are one of the most storied franchises in the National Basketball Association, having won three World Championships, earning nine trips to The Finals, and making 49 playoff appearances over 70 seasons.

For the 76ers Legacy NFT Collection, we partnered with globally renowned artist "**Black Madre**" whose motto is “In handcraft we trust.“ Andre Maciel is a visual artist from São Paulo. Widely known for his custom illustrations for Rob Gronkowski’s record-setting NFT Collection, Black Madre has accumulated various awards and notable publications. His studio is a place of artistic development that enhances creativity with a focus to create and produce quality artistic content. His ethos is handcrafted work has the power to inspire people, build relationships and make ideas more powerful."
drops.description:
For the 2021-22 season, we’re celebrating the NBA’s 75th anniversary by looking back on our team’s beloved home from 1967-1996, The Philadelphia Spectrum. Teams are shaped & remembered by the arenas they play in – rivalries are defined and iconic moments etched in memory. The spirit of the 76ers wouldn’t be what it is today without “America’s Showplace.” 

Own and collect these exclusive limited-edition pieces of 76ers history. The Philadelphia 76ers Legacy NFT Collection will showcase 13 officially licensed commemorative tickets highlighting iconic games and moments that took place during the “Philadelphia Spectrum” era of basketball. Each NFT will be authenticated in partnership with Crypto.com. A portion of proceeds will benefit the Sixers Youth Foundation.

The first NFT celebrates the 76ers first game in the Philadelphia Spectrum. On October 18, 1967, after moving from the Philadelphia Civic Center, the defending-champion 76ers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers, 103-87. Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Famers Wilt Chamberlain and Billy Cunningham led the way for the Sixers. Cunningham scored a team-high 20 points, while Chamberlain posted 11 points with a game-high 30 rebounds and nine assists. The 76ers went on to win 12 of their first 15 games that season, including the first seven games at The Spectrum. Philadelphia finished the 1967-68 campaign with the franchise's third straight Eastern Division title.

**Complete Challenges to unlock Exclusive Rewards:**

If you are holding any **ORIGINAL SERIES** NFTs in your NFT wallet by May 1, 2022 at 12AM EST, you are entitled to redeem an Ultimate 76ers Fan Experience for 2 consisting of the following exclusive benefits:
Lunch at Training Complex prepared by team chef, Watch practice, Meet & Greet, Game-worn jersey, Commemorative Piece of original Philadelphia Spectrum court
*This is triggered on May 1, 2022 at 12AM EST and renews on May 1, 2023 and May 1, 2024.*

If you are holding all 13 **BANNER SERIES** NFTs in your NFT wallet by May 1, 2022 at 12AM EST, you unlock the right to redeem an exclusive Commemorative Piece of original Philadelphia Spectrum court, custom jersey, personalized message from a 76ers Legend, and VIP access to a 76ers event.
*This benefit renews on May 1, 2023 and May 1, 2024*

If you are holding all 13 **SIGNATURE SERIES** NFTs in your NFT wallet by May 1, 2022 at 12AM EST, you unlock the right to redeem an exclusive Commemorative Piece of original Philadelphia Spectrum court and a custom jersey.
*This benefit renews on May 1, 2023 and May 1, 2024*

drops.name: Human Feeling
drops.creatorInfo: **TraumAmnesia** is a French VFX/3D artist. It is the first confinement that pushed him to specialize in this field, the 3d having infinite creative possibilities, he quickly mastered this art and was able to work with brands like Sony, Braun, and Porsche. He recently made NFT platforms his playground, since they finally allow him to create without constraints, and to live fully from his personal creations while remaining in the artistic universe that is dear to him. In a world more and more digitized, he knew how to seize good opportunities for the benefit of his art.
drops.description: "In this drop, I experimented with new techniques, a new mood, strong and subtle, totally representative of what moves me and my style to come. Enjoy as much as I had fun creating these 6 artworks 💜"- **TraumAmnesia**

drops.name: Eternal Magic
drops.creatorInfo: **Lordneutron** is a Brazilian 3D artist who is passionate about animation and esoteric arts. His greatest quality is to bring universal feelings and magic to his concepts.
drops.description: This collection ''*Eternal Magic*'' is about the union of 3 keys that have an infinite power of Wisdom, Energy, and Life. The 3 animations have a protection purpose, by guardians who will never let these keys be stolen. Heavenly power lives in every key, the absolute truth about our infinite universe. Choose your key and you will see the universe in your hands.

drops.name: It Isn't The Usual NFT Drop
drops.creatorInfo: **Micc** is an Italian artist who loves to harmfully provoke others with the intent to originally trigger thoughts in those who observe the works. The working method is enriched and influenced by an Art Director background in the field of Advertising. The latest works are characterized by the use of the 3D technique, self-taught by the artist.

drops.name: Universe
drops.creatorInfo: Lee Irwin, known as "Peak Emotions," is an Irish based digital artist predominantly focusing on nature, environmental and sci-fi artworks. His first encounters with digital artistry began during his initial years as a lighting technician and VJ in the events industry. Specializing in the use of Cinema4d and Octane Render, Irwin tries to add a 'twist' to a real environmental scene but is no stranger to 'experimenting' with other genres.
drops.description:
This collection, "Universe", predominantly focuses on the theme of humans becoming an interplanetary species. It explores the concept of monolithic creations being discovered as a result of this space exploration. ""Universe"" is a snippet of some of my recent everyday artworks on my journey to release my inner creativity. By surrendering myself each day to creating these three-dimensional worlds, I can escape reality even for a brief moment. My overall goal is to inspire viewers and allow them to escape their realities too.  - Peak

In total, there are 3 different pieces distributed amongst 75 surprise art packs. Generated at random, and available for $200 each, the packs will each include 1 piece of collectible art — which can be virtually unwrapped and kept or traded on the Crypto.com/NFT marketplace.

drops.name: Basket Case
drops.creatorInfo: "Young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life." - **DEPLONE**
drops.description: This 3 piece collection represents the feeling of overwhelming madness in our day-to-day lives. Each piece represents different problems and bad decisions one can make, even when they first look promising.

drops.name: Re: Collapsing Reality
drops.creatorInfo: Cyberpunk and Infrared photographer, I'm sharing my passion for Japan and retro wave aesthetics through my original photos. I'm creating NFT to explore new different styles! - **Senbenito**
drops.description: "*Re: Collapsing Reality*" is the sequel of the Collapsing reality series of original photos edited in a cyberpunk / glitchy aesthetic. What would be our life in the future, when the real world will be linked to virtuality, artificial intelligence, and new technologies. What would happen if a bug occurs, does the world will collapse? What if everything was just a simulation? Who knows... New bugs were reported in Japan, the collapse is not finished yet...

drops.name: 365 Days in Surrealland
drops.description: I have planned a short trip for you in Surrealland, where I live. You can see the full reflection of the emotional changes that develop in 365 days here. Include Surrealland in your travel plans. You are just a click away! - **Oguz Dogru**

drops.name: DRESSX COSMIC - Inspired by SPACEX
Disturbing Pieces That Will Haunt You Forever
The Solivagant
Drunk Collection 2
drops.creatorInfo: **TWOJ STARY 997** is an artist from another planet in a different galaxy. He specializes in 3d animation. His art shows in a funny way what surrounds him on a daily basis. His distinctive and colorful compositions contrast with the theme of his works, which is often simply disgusting and repulsive.
drops.description: A drunken collection deals with the difficult topic of alcoholism in society. Regardless of social status, everyone can fall into addiction. These different animations provide for distinct environments that symbolize different social classes. Despite the difficult subject, the artist creates them in a fun and colorful form that allows you to laugh for a moment but also causes a moment of reflection.

drops.name: Art Pieces That Will Freeze Your Blood
drops.creatorInfo:
I am a full-time Krampus mask carver and self-taught Illustrator and Concept Artist living in Salzburg, Austria. I started drawing when I was a little kid, I was fascinated by creating characters and scenes that don’t exist in real life. Over the years I always wanted to improve my skills and techniques until I reach a level that my role models have.

Art became a big part of my life, and I can’t imagine living without it. Learning new things and subjects is giving me extra motivation every day. I’m currently specialized in digital paintings, with this medium it's easier for me and faster to capture an idea.

I love to draw images that tell a story, the painting should trigger a certain feeling in the observer and make him think. Especially I like to paint creepy and dark stuff, it’s just thrilling to “play” with the fear of the viewer. My characters, the mood and the story is most of the time from imagination.
drops.description:
"As a special Halloween drop, I've decided to bring the audiences a more unsettling and disturbing collection. Through scary art, I'm exposing my inner demons to the world to gaze upon and with that in mind I aim to send chills down your spine." - **Stefan Koidl**

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: ATLAS I: POST-TITANOMACHY
drops.creatorInfo:
Hello, I am **Ozan Gonen**, 29 years old visual artist based in Istanbul, Turkey. I have 8 years of experience with visual design. I create art with 3D, and most of them are artworks in space. Being very much into space art might be because the hours I work without any distraction are the ones at night. Yet, there is a possibility that it is just the dark theme which is very same both at night and in space. I like creating visual stories supporting and combining them with science fiction, mythology and, my imagination to make people have different emotional experiences. 

It is a source of both pleasure and pride for me to be someone whose works were selected by many social media platforms and mentioned by well-known websites. I have directed animated short films that were screened. As a different source of joy and pride, they won prizes in festivals. I worked with art galleries and created visual arts for the screen. That thought a lot in many ways. In that field, my tools are Cinema 4D and Octane Render. As for hobbies, they are digital painting, drawing, photography, and generative arts.
drops.description:
According to a story, Atlas was condemned by Zeus to carry the sky on his back for eternity after the Titanomachy, the Clash of the Titans. According to the same story, Atlas, who carried the sky on his back for a long time, was freed from this burden for once. It was thanks to Heracles. He carried the sky for a time that Atlas went and took some apples from his daughters. In the end, Atlas got his burden on his back again.

I believe, it is worthy of note that Atlas was able to leave his burden to someone. The thing that kept his burden on his back was what Zeus told him. In my science fiction-styled interpretation of the story, the (condemnation) words of Zeus were the ties connecting Atlas to the world.

drops.name: Utopian Universe
drops.creatorInfo: *Sharonna Karni* *Cohen* is the founder of **Dreame**; a collective of artists turning dreams into art. *Bev Acton* is an illustrator using collage. For *Bev*, the beauty of design is storytelling. **Dreame Collective** is a group of 500 artists around the world turning dreams, ideas, memories, and stories into customized artworks.
drops.description: This collection is inspired by 10,000 dreams for the future of the planet inspired by a range of dreamers around the world. It is part of The Big Dream. One collective artwork that will be unveiled around the world in 2022 and then travel to an international space station aboard Axiom Space’s AX1 mission. **Dreame** artists *Sharonna Karni Cohen* and *Bev Acton* chose some of the dreams to illustrate. These artworks will be a part of a traveling exhibition that will be unveiled in 20 locations and space.

drops.name: Lost in Space
drops.creatorInfo: **Metin Akçakoca** is a freelance CG Artist - Motion Designer based in London who graduated from Gazi University - Fine Arts in 2010 (Ankara/Turkey). With over 10 years of experience in the industry, he's been fortunate enough to collaborate with some of the leading international brands, creative studios, agencies, and individuals. He has endless curiosity and imagination and his biggest ideal is to develop himself and learn something new every day.
drops.description:
"In this drop, I processed a theme that I wanted to do for a long time. It was exciting to deal with this subject, which is full of unknowns. Get ready to look into the depths of space from my point of view." - **Metin Akçakoca**
 

This collection features a special edition NFT giveaway. Three random buyers will be selected to win a Special Edition 3/3 NFT by the artist. 

- Your NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet when the drop ends in order to be eligible.

drops.name: Mehmet Turgut Presents: ROCK DROP
drops.description:
When **Mehmet Turgut** was a child, his dream was to work with Rock Stars. As an internationally recognized photographer, 20 years ago, this dream became a reality.
 
Now it is time to welcome these works to the  NFT World with this exclusive "*Rock Drop*". 
 
One lucky buyer will be selected at random for each of the 4 collectibles to receive a signed physical print of the original piece. 
- Primary and secondary sales are both eligible.
- The NFT must be in your Crypto.com/nft wallet by end of the drop.

[Read some of the stories behind the photos used in the drop in our Q&A with Mehmet Turgut.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/photographer-mehmet-turgut-offers-nfts-of-rock-stars-ozzy-osbourne-and-alice-cooper-in-rock-drop-931810036c3e)

drops.name: Psychokitties
drops.description: The "*Psychokitties*" collection consists of 6 original kittycat characters. All psychokitties are extremely creative with high openness towards life. With their unpredictable nature and eccentric personality, anything can happen.

drops.name: The Journey Collection
drops.creatorInfo: My creations represent a mix of digital art and cinematography that conveys the best of both worlds allowing me to translate my ideas into a unique form of creative expression. - **Kaiwan Shaban**
drops.description: A man's best friend is often his ride. Throughout the century it has helped men to explore the world on exotic journeys. Novelty is what feeds their boundless curiosity.

drops.name: OFF.MG9C.OFA
drops.creatorInfo: **ONEFALLART** is a UK-based, self-taught Digital Artist with a Master's degree in Psychology. His creations are marked by emotions and ruled by destruction. He makes his Artwork as complicated as we are as human beings. In all this chaos, nothing is accidental, and everything adds up to a unique whole, like beautiful disorder.

drops.name: The Mystery of Sci-Fi Nostalgia
drops.creatorInfo:
**Bernarda NIBERA Conič** (aka **NIBERA**) is an interdisciplinary visual artist based in Ljubljana, Slovenia. She is a graphic designer by day, VJ and photographer by night, and a film photographer at the weekend. She also created a wide range of new media installations as a nightclub stage designer from 2017 to. In 2020, she created over 50 album covers for musicians from all over the world. 

Her creative path started at a very young age. At primary school, the teachers noticed her talent and artistic potential in art classes, and they encouraged her to apply to the school for design and photography in Ljubljana. Four years later, in 2011, she graduated in photography. One year later, **Nibera** studied textile and fashion design and specialized in pattern design and textile printing. After getting her bachelor’s degree in (2016), she studied graphic design at the Academy of Fine Arts and Design in Ljubljana and, in 2019, was awarded her master’s degree in Visual Communication Design.

drops.name: RisingStar x The Professor: Break Your Ankles
drops.creatorInfo:
**RisingStar** is an augmented and virtual reality production studio creating immersive volumetric 3D video content for artists, influencers, and brands. Our Volumetric Video Capture system allows us to maximize the potential of VFX and CGI at a fraction of the cost for other studios. The RisingStar platform is a simplified AR player that lets users create content together with their favorite artists, and creators in a shareable format that works with all of today’s popular social media platforms.
 
**Grayson "The Professor" Boucher** was born and raised in Keizer, Oregon. His dad introduced him to the game of basketball at 2 years old and he quickly found his passion for the game in 4th grade. Growing up, he practiced basketball an absurd amount of hours per day and garnered local attention with his game and dribbling skills. He honed his craft where he was able to turn pro at 18, landing a spot on the globally famed And 1 Mixtape Tour in 2003. Streetball: The And 1 Mixtape Tour had an ESPN reality television series documenting the team's tours year-round, which aired for 7 seasons. After And 1, The Professor continued to tour the world wowing crowds with his ball-handling skills and posting his highlight-driven content on his YouTube channel ProfessorLive, which he started in 2009. 
           
Following his viral video Spiderman Basketball Episode 1 in 2013, his channel reached over 100 million views. The Professor continues to travel the world and expand his brand on social media. Today his youtube channel has 1 billion views and he has over 16 million followers across all social media platforms. To date, his Spiderman Basketball web series has become the number 1 most viewed web series on all of YouTube.
drops.description:
THE PROFESSOR "Break Your Ankles" Series:
RisingStar and The Professor partnered up to use the latest volumetric capture technology and CGI to create this “Break Your Ankle” NFT Series. This drop features The Professor’s top 6 crossover moves where he “breaks the ankles” of some of the world’s most well-known icons (Obama, Trump, Elon Musk, Mark Cuban, Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson, Kanye West, and Gary Vee).
 

AND1 street-baller, The Professor, came to RisingStar to create his NFT series.  Using older technology like CGI, the unique play-style of The Professor could never be seamlessly recreated. Since RisingStar’s volumetric captures are photorealistic, every intricacy of The Professor’s movement translates to his hologram. RisingStar then took his hologram and placed him in six animated worlds and rivaled him against six pop culture icons.
  
             
While we were not able to get Barack Obama in the studio, using our supplementary motion capture suit and available 3D models, The Professor can “break the ankles” of Obama and The Rock alike. 

This drop features a special raffle. For each NFT purchased, the owner will receive tickets for a chance to spend the day and play one-on-one with the professor, along with a $20K cash prize. 

- All NFTs must be in your Crypto.com/nft wallet by the end of the drop.
- Only primary sale purchases are eligible  

[*Read an exclusive interview with The Professor and preview the collection on our blog...*](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/streetball-legend-the-professor-schools-pop-culture-icons-in-crypto-com-nft-drop-7eb927d978e8)
  
[*Check out The Professor's video on YouTube.*](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6sHdX6_5BfY)

drops.name: Universe Within
drops.creatorInfo: **Himanshu Arya** is a self-taught digital artist currently based in New Delhi, India creating surreal scenes of Conception, Darkness, & Abstractionism for 4 years. Featured in Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Blogs and many more.
drops.description: A series of artworks showcasing the Universe within ourselves. Not only are we in the Universe, but the Universe is also in us. Our Universe within consciousness and mind is like a hologram that reflects and models the greater hologram of reality, from within reality. A place where nobody is allowed to enter except ourselves. Some people do visit there occasionally and some just stay there all the time. These artworks depict one's self-awareness of its own universe, being lost in it voluntarily, and our connection to other beings & their universe.

drops.name: The Last Perception
drops.creatorInfo: "I am an independent, multidisciplinary, self-taught Designer and Art Director who has a love for creativity and enjoys experimenting with various techniques. As a designer, writer, film enthusiast, and computer nerd, I’m interested in visual storytelling. My goal is to be able to tell stories through imagery using the latest rendering technology.” - **Suman Kairwan**

drops.name: Jordan Beau x Heard Well: Retro Genesis Drop
drops.creatorInfo: **Jordan Beau** is a self-proclaimed comedian and YouTuber with over 1.2 million subscribers watching his vlogs, stunts, and pranks. Jordan has been very intrigued by this new space of digital collectibles for a while. He's very excited to be able to collaborate on my own NFT and help pave the way for future collectibles. This is barely just the beginning. **Heard Well** is the first music label entirely powered by social tastemakers and their communities. **Heard Well** partners with best-in-class influencers and creators to curate playlists of their favorite emerging artists. Each playlist is released in digital format providing fans the ability to discover new music and enable our clients and the musicians they care about to profit from their artistry. Stemming from our clients’ success we have contributed to breaking top artists including Billie Eilish, LANY, Lauv, ODESZA, Duke Dumont, and more.
drops.description: Kicking it back to the 80s! **Jordan Beau** x **Heard Well** bring you a new mind-trip with retro art and music inspired by YouTube superstar **Jordan Beau**'s Heard Well playlist. Level 1 buyers will get the digital NFT. Level 2 buyers will also get a physical, numbered print of the NFT art (not including re-sale buyers). The Level 3 auction includes the holo digital NFT, a custom physical print of the NFT, and a Zoom chat with the man himself: **Jordan Beau**. In addition, each auction participant during the drop period will be awarded a special Heard Well Coin NFT.

The Halloween Special

He has been creating art for the past 4 years and has been featured by Hindustan Times, Adobe Photoshop, Bored Panda, Expert Photography, and many more.
drops.description:
"*The Halloween Special*" is a collection of 3 artworks created by **Pulkit Kudiwal**. In this collection, the artist portrays different spooky stories featuring anecdotes of the Halloween spirit including jack-o-lanterns in various haunting scenarios. 

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: Protect the Jellyfishes
Dynamic Forces
drops.creatorInfo: **Yo Dojo** is a full-time nerd who fills his hours in front of a screen making art so other nerds can get rich.  Starting his career in 3D by creating custom projection mapping content for stages, massive domes, giant snowboard jumps, and even a Porsche; **Yo Dojo** has built up a 'nerdoriety' from exceptional 3D animations.
drops.description: The "*Dynamic Forces*" drop is a mixed up, mashed up, and complete chaos for the subjects, but delightful for the viewer. The simplicity of the setting brings out the beauty of motion and the forces that cause it.

drops.name: Your Personal Journey
Gareth Bale: The Evolution of a Footballer
drops.description:
This drop is Gareth Bale's entrance into the digital collectible market, allowing him to connect with and extend value to his fans around the world. Created in conjunction with talented London-based artist Dines, these pieces represent the first in a limited series of drops with Crypto.com. 

 
The drop includes an Open Edition NFT titled “*A Moment in Time*” for fans just entering the space. This piece commemorates one of Gareth's greatest moments for Real Madrid, where he won 13 trophies and has returned to seek number 14. In the 2018 Champions League Final, Bale was named man of the match, scoring with a majestic bicycle kick which stands as one of the greatest Champions League goals of all time. We're thrilled to present this moment as an NFT in an immersive recreation that Gareth has digitally hand-signed. *One lucky buyer of this NFT will be selected at random to be awarded a signed Wales Gareth Bale Jersey.*
- *Your NFT must be in your Crypto.com/nft wallet by the end of the drop.* 
- *Only Primary purchases are eligible to win.*

 
Also included in the drop are 2 Limited Edition NFTs designed to catalogue his football journey, these pieces feature Gareth suiting up for club and country; “*The Journey: Gold*” and “*The Journey: Platinum*”. 

*For the Gold Edition, 3 lucky buyers will be selected at random to win a signed Wales Gareth Bale Jersey.* 

*For the Platinum Edition, 4 lucky buyers will be selected at random to win a signed Gareth Bale Real Madrid Jersey.* 
- *Your NFT must be in your Crypto.com/nft wallet by the end of the drop.* 
- *Primary and secondary purchases are eligible to win.* 

 
The final piece titled “*The Journey: Rare*” is an ultra-rare 1 of 1 digital trading card Auction piece with exciting benefits. *This includes a signed jersey, and a VIP Experience at the 2022 Welsh Open presented by Gareth Bale – taking place at the legendary Celtic Manor. Winners will receive 2 VIP tickets for all tournament sessions (Wednesday-Sunday), with food and drink included. This tournament takes place in July every year. This prize must be redeemed before June 2022.*

- *Only the primary auction winner is eligible.* 


 
[*Read our exclusive interview with DINES, the artist who brought Bale's vision to life for the drop, and preview the collection on our blog.*](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/dines-talks-nfts-grime-music-and-collaborating-with-football-star-gareth-bale-on-new-drop-5caa6728c121)

drops.name: Keyboard Types
drops.creatorInfo: **Linus Dahlgrens** is a freelance 3D Artist based in Gothenburg, Sweden. Growing up with a pencil in his hand he found his way into advertising and fell in love with 3D along the way. With a childish curiosity for techniques, he combines colorful and clever concepts with a somewhat twisted look at the real world.
drops.description:
**Linus Dahlgrens** first drop on Crypto.com ”*Keyboard Types*”, is a multifaceted trip in the world of digital communication. It features three satisfying loops all about the pictures you are trying to paint and the feelings you are working so hard to express only using keys. We all know being personal, joking at the right time, or just sending your partner some love can be very challenging on that small screen. You are neither in line nor out of line. Mastering those cute little emojis is truly an art form.

So what type are you, and how do you type?

drops.creatorInfo: **Robert Chew** is a Concept Artist, Illustrator, and Creator exploring new worlds and ideas. Robert likes to mix cultural tropes and themes with sci-fi and fantasy elements to create exciting and thought-provoking concepts. Along with The Big Five, previous projects include The Agents of Sin, The Agents of Virtue, and Shikigami. Professional projects include Borderlands 3 and Battleborn at Gearbox Software.
drops.description: "*SHIKIGAMI*" explores Japanese mythology and Yokai lore through a military sci-fi lens. The world of Shikigami centers around Yokai and Onmyouji partnering together to protect their shrines and the visitors who come to worship at them. An Onmyouji is an individual who has proven themselves worthy to partner with a Yokai. A Yokai is a supernatural being that represents an element or force of nature. When a Yokai chooses to serve an Onmyouji they gain the title of Shikigami. Though some Onmyouji and Shikigami work for the good of all, others use this powerful bond for personal gain by working as mercenaries, thieves, or assassins for the highest bidder. A delicate balance must be maintained to protect both humans and Yokai in the world of SHIKIGAMI.

drops.name: DRESSX x UNSEENBERRIES
drops.creatorInfo:
**DRESSX** is the largest fashion store for digital-only collections from well-known brands and 3D designers. DRESSX provides a digital solution for dressing up people’s images. Through the use of digital clothing, the user can simply layer fashion items on top of a photo to create a whole new outfit. 

As a solution to the negative environmental footprint produced by the fashion industry, DRESSX was created by **Daria Shapovalova** and **Natalia Modenova** in July 2020 as the first-ever platform for digital garments that generate zero waste, carbon footprints, and chemicals during their production. Working with traditional and 3D fashion designers, the platform offers virtual clothes that can be worn on photos as a substitute for buying physical clothes solely for content creation. DRESSX's main goal is to provide a sustainable yet fun alternative to the industry we know today by making a big step towards digital fashion integrated with 3D technology and enabling digital garments to be worn across various digital platforms. In order to democratize fashion for the final consumer, DRESSX gives every client an opportunity to digitally dress in clothing they have always wanted to wear - and get instant verification from their followers on social media and beyond. Since its launch, DRESSX has become the biggest platform for digital fashion, with over 100 designers on board and thousands of items digitized and available for purchase on the website. At DRESSX, we are absolutely sure that the future of fashion is digital.                                                                                                                                                                         

**Bio of the creator of Avatars**
Name: Dear Jay
Age: 21
Location: Ukraine 
Code: 014 
Occupation: Avatar creator
By the moment when pandemic took its place in the world I had no job and ambitions. But I always had huge influence from different kinds of art but didn’t really knew what to do with all that energy and inspiration that art gave me. My mind was like a  dusty warehouse with all the ideas I had. But then I found out what 3D art is and how deep this direction is.

**Bio of the Avatar curator**
Name: Olga Sushko
Location: France
Code: Not detected
Occupation: Avatar curator, Creating NFT projects for DRESSX company in collaboration with the most open-minded and talented artists.
drops.description:
**DRESSX**'s second drop with Crypto.com introduces unique female avatars - Unseenberries race from planet "The Garden".

•000 Cherry (known as hunter)
•001 Sakura (one of the most peaceful individuals from Unseenberries)
•003 Bizkit (the only avatar who is not made of skin and flesh. This individual body consists of unknown stone)
•004 Skin (siren/healer)
•005 Forest (main ability is weather control)

Avatars are dressed in **DRESSX** Cosmic inspired by SpaceX digital collection and in **DRESSX** Meta dresses.

*Created by Dear Jay 
Curated by Olga Sushko*

drops.name: Divine Intervention
drops.creatorInfo: A self-taught graphic designer who begun creating artworks out of passion at the age of 18, and started freelancing for many music labels/musicians and clothing brands such as Fresh hoods. **Sxbres**' goal is to express as much emotion he can as well as communicate and leave meaningful messages in his artworks.

drops.name: Inside Tarogramma
drops.creatorInfo: **Damien Cifelli** is an award-winning multi-disciplinary visual artist who has exhibited internationally. Each of his NFTs serves as artifacts from the fictional world of Tarogramma, a place that lives in parallel with our own world. It is a hidden place that explorers have been searching for for centuries; it is believed by some to be an inaccessible forgotten city, others to be the afterlife, and many to be completely fictional.
drops.description:
The third drop of Tarogramma artefacts further explores the people that inhabit the secret world of Tarogramma. These artefacts are part of a recently discovered haul containing a great survey of the inhabitants, giving us the greatest idea so far of what life is like inside the city. '*AMOK*' is a unique, entirely hand-painted animation that gives us a rare opportunity to see life inside Tarogramma. Three portraits; of '*ASHA*' '*ARTHUR*' and '*LUDO*' reveal the faces of individual citizens that inhabit the hidden world. Finally, 'THANKSGIVING AT THE GOLDEN CALF' depicts a wide range of citizens coming together at Tarogramma's favourite bar to celebrate thanksgiving season. 

Collectors will have the opportunity to own these artefacts and images - pieces of an alternative world and be fictional archaeologists, uncovering new elements of the Tarogramma universe as they are released.

drops.name: The Temple
Out of this World
drops.creatorInfo: Becoming a global powerhouse franchise takes dedication, innovation, and a knack for exploration into new frontiers. This drive for newborn understanding and imagination separates those who excel in this rapidly changing environment, from the static individuals who are left behind. Founded in 1981, **Quiznos** has had 40 years of prosperity, and quite frankly global domination, with their legendary toasted submarine sandwiches. With over 500 locations worldwide, **Quiznos** recognizes the importance of building an extensive community and providing their loyal customers with a reliable, contemporary, and of course, delicious product. In collaboration with Sameer Baloch, a highly acclaimed digital artist known for his incredibly vibrant and futuristic pieces, **Quiznos** has made their entrance.
drops.description: Astronauts embark on a brave mission to different planets throughout the crypto galaxy with the purpose of introducing innovative and alternative methods of sustainability.

drops.name: Haiku's Paradise
drops.creatorInfo: **Camila Nogueira** (1993, Portugal) is a digital artist who focuses on reinterpreting reality with a magical vibe and creating surreal worlds we would love to live in. Her visual narratives take us to the beauty side and make us look at life with a more joyous and dreamy perspective. Her aesthetic is a transformation of the Japanese woodblock style with comic book influences, as well as Studio Ghibli's animations. Using pastel color and smooth gradients she creates colorful gentle and idyllic scenes inspired by Nature.
drops.description: Haiku is a type of short-form poetry originally from Japan, whose origins can be traced back as far as the 9th century. It is considered to be more than a type of poem; it’s a way of looking at the physical world and seeing something deeper, like the very nature of existence, leaving the reader with a strong feeling or impression. Haikus have the ability to paint a vivid picture in just a few words — making every syllable count.

drops.name: Anjulie VS MACHADOXLEAO and UP Inspiring Motion: White Lights
drops.description:
Scheduled for release in 2012, "*White Lights*" can be considered as one of **Anjulie**'s many lost tracks. Confident that her fans are still waiting for the party promised in the video of the choreography rehearsal signed by **Dejan Tubic** & **Janelle Ginestra**, **Anjulie** wants to distribute a limited amount of copies of the track's final master exclusively to them.

[*Read an interview with Anjulie and Machado Leão about the drop and preview the collection on our blog.*](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/anjulie-releases-lost-track-as-nft-with-digital-artist-machado-le%C3%A3o-c1b50a5f5bde)

drops.name: The Market
drops.description:
"*The Market*" is a collection of images that focuses on concepts that highlight the cryptocurrency market from the volatility to an overall view of cryptocurrency. These compositions focus on Crypto Volatility, 24/7 Trading, Dodgecoin pumps, and overall fun concepts!
 
This collection features 2 grand prizes. $5000 USD of Bitcoin, and another $5000 USD of Dogecoin will be awarded to 2 lucky pack purchasers that will be selected at random. 

- The NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet before the drop ends.

drops.name: Postcards From a Dream
drops.creatorInfo: **Fran Rodríguez** is a digital artist based in Barcelona. Since he was a child he was attracted by surrealism and psychedelia. He experimented with painting and graphic design in his teenage years until he discovered digital collage, the medium that has led him to become one of the main names in the international collage scene. He has been working as a freelance artist for almost twenty years, currently focusing on his more personal projects and creating album covers for international bands such as Tame Impala, Weezer, or Twin Shadow, and all the big names in Spanish music.
drops.description: Relax. Make yourself comfortable. Here begins a journey into the interior of your mind. Ladies and gentlemen, enjoy the dream.

drops.name: Erick Sermon x David Strickland - NFT Collection
drops.creatorInfo: **David "Gordo" Strickland** is an Indigenous, Toronto born and based grammy/juno award-winning engineer, mixer, producer and DJ. Known for being behind the boards on iconic Hip-Hop and R&B records for over two decades, his work has graced seminal tracks by the likes of Pete Rock, **Erick Sermon**, EPMD, Keith Murray, Redman and Method Man, to records by ground-breaking Toronto hip-hop acts, including Drake, k-os, Ghetto Concept, Jelleestone, Kardinal Offishall, Jully Black and Choclair. Erick Sermon is an American rapper, musician, and record producer. He is best known as one-third—alongside PMD & DJ Scratch—of 1980s/1990s hip hop group EPMD and for his production work.
drops.description:
The official NFT collaboration with Hip-Hop Legend **Erick Sermon** of EPMD and renowned Canadian-Indigenous artist/engineer/producer **David Strickland** (Drake, EPMD, Method Man, Redman).  Aside from being a grammy award-winning producer/engineer, David is a visual artist whose Indigenous infused art has been displayed at major galleries like McMichael Gallery and commissioned by Apple Music for their Indigenous Sounds section. Erick and David are donating 30% of their proceeds from the primary NFT sales to the [Indian Residential School Survivors Society](https://www.irsss.ca/). The drop follows the release of David's single '[Messenger](https://ffm.to/messenger)' which features Erick Sermon, Saukrates & Outlaw By Nature and is available everywhere.

[Erick Sermon and David Strickland spoke about NFTs, EPMD's legacy, Indigenous hip-hop and more on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/erick-sermon-and-david-strickland-talk-nfts-and-indigenous-hip-hop-638ae43b5c51)

drops.name: The Great Pumpkin Drop
drops.creatorInfo:
**Christian** is a 3D generalist who experiments with shape, music, movement, and material. He loves to play with varying animation techniques using 2D and 3D elements to create a fun and unique world.
He is currently based out of Vancouver and is getting ready to get spooky!
drops.description: Halloween is a scary and magical time. The pumpkin is an iconic feature of this festive time. This drop features four fun pieces taking the viewer on a spooky or magical ride. Choose your adventure!

drops.name: Fear of the Unknown
drops.creatorInfo: **Shortest Blockbusters** is an Artist and a Filmmaker who creates immersive surreal dreams and nightmares. In just over a year, **Shortest Blockbusters** has, to date, attracted over 12 Million fans and more than 4 Billion views online for creating terrifying and mesmerizing 15-second films.
drops.description:
A collection of immersive surreal nightmares that invokes the anxiety of being vulnerable to the fear of the unknown. Fear of unthinkable possibilities leads you to experience a heightened sense of awareness of your human mortality. 


[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: OUR SPOOKY DREAMS
drops.creatorInfo:
**Shagun Damadia** is a 2D Digital Artist who focuses upon creating well-detailed visuals with strong storytelling features. The artist aims to convey a message and wants to show a normal life scene in a dramatic way with beautiful colors, elements, and lighting. **Shagun Damadia** also likes to add a bit of surreal feeling in his work, so the audience can connect to it even more.

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)
drops.description: A collection of spooky, yet beautiful well-detailed artworks from **Shagun Damadia**. The artworks are loaded with stories, drama, and suspense. The goal with these artworks is to let people interpret their own scary story, as spookiness can show perfect dramatic scenes. When a person has to face a scary situation, they might be scared, but still, they have to face it with courage. The three artworks demonstrate entering a scary environment, making ghost friends, and finally, facing the REAL FEAR.

drops.name: Endless Night
drops.creatorInfo: Lover of monsters, guts, and horror, **Cailbur** is a french 3D artist who likes to bring to life moody, unsettling, and weird worlds. But beware astronauts and kitties are still lurking in the dark...
drops.description:
This collection is an extract of a series of artwork, mainly scary and discolored, dealing with a daily life ruled by fears. Worlds where the sky keeps getting darker, people are chased, and disgusting pigs selling cheap lemonade in the woods. I wanted to explore the possibilities of a dark universe, using very sober color palettes, and a very strong frontal exposure, offering very marked shadows, accentuating the details and the coldness of the scene. "Goodbye Blue Sky" is a reference to the famous band Pink Floyd. I've always been a big fan of their music, and the movie "The Wall" played a huge part in my artistic development and my vision of life. "Fvck Them" is obviously a joke. Astronauts have had for a while, and still do sometimes, a huge place in digital art. It was present as a guarantee to get an artwork loved by all. "Only 25¢" is a completely offbeat artwork. I wanted to transcribe a rather basic scene, which could even be pleasant, but through the prism of horror.

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: Crypto Voxelverse
drops.creatorInfo: Travis Ragsdale is a 3D artist who has been making art for the past 8 years+. He lives in Dallas TX and creates a wide range of digital art and content. One of his specialties is creating satisfying looping animations that soothe and relax the viewer.
drops.description:
This drop features unique, playful worlds that visualize the NFT creation process from a whimsical isometric vantage point. These pieces take you from the Etherum crystal mine to the minting of the NFT file, and finally the auction of the art piece. Hidden easter eggs and meta-references are peppered throughout these detailed pieces, so spare no attention as you venture into the quirky isometric world of Travis Ragsdale’s latest drop, “Crypto Voxelverse”.

This collection features 2 grand prize winners that will be selected at random at the end of the drop. $5000 USD of ETH will be awarded to 1 lucky pack purchaser, and another $5000 USD of ETH will be awarded to 1 lucky Open Edition purchaser.
- The NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet before the drop ends.

drops.name: Tarot Connection: The Fool, The Magician & The Sun
drops.creatorInfo: **Lucas** is a Professional Illustrator and full-time NFT Artist from Villa Alemana, Chile. He is represented by The NFT Agency (CA) and Chimera Crypto Art (UK), and is a member of The Association of Illustrators (UK). He works as a Fine Art Illustrator, solely focused on making personal artworks. His surrealism combines a technique of analog drawing and pointillism, with digital painting. His inspirations are philosophy, psychoanalysis, and deep meditations about our existence. He was First place winner in “Brightness Illustration Awards 2020” (UK), Gold winner in "Global Illustration Awards 2020" (China), Shortlisted for "World Illustration Awards 2020" (UK), and Merit winner in the Annual No.17 (2020) by 3x3 The Magazine of Contemporary Illustration (NY, EEUU).
drops.description: Collection of three artworks by Lucas León, Professional Illustrator from Chile. These pieces are influenced by cards of the Tarot deck, from where he brings his own interpretations. He begins with the playful confidence of the Fool, who goes to the unknown without a structure. The Magician transforms that energy to guide it to concrete directions of responsibility with oneself, and finally, the effects of that movement and the creations of that empowered energy, are expanded and enjoyed in The Sun, as an abundant place where the combination of play and work has spiritual enlightenment. Lucas unified these meanings and creates elegant compositions with his handmade inked pointillism technique and a colorful digital painting. His work brings us questions about life and the choices that are in front of us, that we can take to increase understanding and authentic vitalism of ourselves.

drops.name: Spooky Gang
drops.creatorInfo: **Enisaurus** is a Digital Dinosaur with a computer passioned for Illustration & Animation. His bold and sharp geometric style is influenced by his love for great unconventional stories, everything from his childhood, nature, art, and pop culture from all over the world, but also for the most common things that make life more interesting and exciting place to enjoy. He has developed projects for clients like Adobe, Twitter, DoorDash, Converse, Disney, Shake Shack, Pepsi, Harvard, The Washington Post, BMW, and Dropbox.
drops.description:
After the unprecedented success of his first NFTs collection for Crypto.com titled "Uncertain Times", which sold out in less than 24h, Enisaurus is very thrilled to announce his new and exclusive special Halloween collection, a drop composed of four classic monsters animations full of spooky details and good vibes, everything you need to level up this season and make it memorable. Happy Halloween to all of you, future monster owners!

This drop features a special NFT giveaway from the creator for anyone who holds all 4 drop pieces by the drop's end.

- All four NFTs must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet by the end of the drop


[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: Blind Nihilism
drops.creatorInfo: **İrfan Kaya** reacts to the traditional passive, submissive human role and in order to get an image beyond the conventional truth, He collects memories from different lives.
drops.description: "*Blind Nihilism*" is a reaction to traditional reality. With a simple and materialistic attitude, it opposes the classical understanding of destiny and the meaningless relationship between will and belief. It advocates a way of thinking and living inculcated by feelings of meaninglessness, emptiness, and nothingness. It aims to satisfy the curiosity of the end and beyond.

drops.name: A Head Full of Dreams
drops.creatorInfo: **Ankit Paul** (2000, India) is a digital artist who focuses on Imagination with a magical vibe and creating surreal worlds we would love to live in. Featured in various art galleries worldwide, his works are filled with vibrant colors and with a touch of fantasy.
drops.description: "A Head Full of Dreams" is a series of artworks where I had put my imaginations into picture. As a visual artist whenever I sit to create something I feel like I am in a world I have never been. A world of Dreams, Fantasy, and Imagination. Putting everything together makes up this dreamy series of artworks.

drops.name: Heavy Metal Magazine & Romero Pictures Present: The Rise
drops.creatorInfo:
The film Night of the Living Dead changed popular culture forever, and now George C. Romero, the son of legendary film director George A. Romero, tells the story before the worst night on Earth. Learn about the death, destruction, and tragedy that led to the birth of the modern zombie in this prequel horror saga to the most significant and influential horror film franchise in history! 

George C. Romero is a veteran film and television producer, director, best-selling comic book writer, CEO of Romero Pictures, and founder of The Veterans’ Compound, a 501(c)3 organization dedicated to helping Veterans through the visual arts and granular aspects of filmmaking. Born into the industry, Romero took the road less traveled and has spent the last 30 years working across the industry but has always stayed true to his belief that indie creators have to feed and nurture their inner creative, develop a trust relationship with it, and believe that it will always steer a creative toward the right choices. With two comic books, almost two dozen films, and hundreds of commercial campaigns and brand strategies under his belt, George has written, produced and/or directed more than 35 film, television, and streaming projects and serves as a business consultant and mentor for young and new filmmakers, content creators and entrepreneurs to help them navigate the turbulence of the entertainment industry.

[Read our interview with George C. Romero and preview part of the collection on the Crypto.com NFT blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/george-c-romero-and-heavy-metal-resurrect-the-zombie-genre-in-nfts-with-the-rise-d800d72568d9)
drops.description:
**Heavy Metal Magazine & Romero Pictures Present: The Rise.** *A Motion Comic Documentary of Zombies. Family. Art. Counter Culture & Fringe Film Making.*

Heavy Metal Magazine and Romero Pictures team up to bring you a one-of-a-kind collectible. Forged with over 50 years of genre storytelling the two brands with the help of George C. Romero deliver a short motion comic film that spans the birth of the zombie genre all the way to George C.’s ambitious undertaking with The Rise. See Heavy Metal pages ripped from the magazine unlike ever before, and listen to the gospel of George Romero and why Night, George Sr. And The Rise are such critical pieces to the zeitgeist of genre. Horror and the birth of Zombism. 

This drop features a variety of redeemables associated with each individual collectible.  
**The Rise: Part 1:** All collectors holding this NFT by the drop’s end will be awarded digital issues of The Rise Chapters 1–5 ripped from the pages of Heavy Metal Magazine.

**The Rise: Part 2:** All collectors who hold this collectible during a snapshot taken on November 8th, 9am EST will be invited to join a 45-minute group seminar with George C. Romero and other special guests. 

**The Rise: Part 3:** All collectors who hold this collectible during a snapshot taken on November 15th, 9am EST will be sent special edition NFTs, digitally signed by the Artist and Author.

**The Rise: Motion Comic Documentary - Feature Length:** All 10 primary sales auction winners will be awarded a 30 minute one on one zoom call with George C. Romero, as well as a full-resolution copy of the complete Motion Comic Documentary. 

**The Rise Part 1, 2, and 3 Trade-In**
If you are holding The Rise: Part 1, 2 and 3, you will have the option to trade in all 3 NFTs to receive the Full Collection NFT in return. Users who wish to trade in must withdraw their 3 NFTs from their Crypto.com/nft wallets to a non-custodial wallet, such as Crypto.com DeFi Wallet, and then send all three NFTs to the wallet address listed below. 
Users must withdraw the editions they own of The Rise: Part 1, 2 & 3 and send to the following wallet address {cro1lppc40v2ttxfy97mq7fu83r7zs3gtf044huzwm} by November 22, 9am EST. 
After the cutoff time, users who successfully sent all 3 NFTs to the provided wallet address will be airdropped the full video within 2 weeks. Please note that you will only be eligible to receive the Full Collection NFT if all 3 Parts are sent to the wallet address before the deadline. For instructions on how to withdraw your NFTs, please see [this video](https://blog.crypto.com/crypto-com-nft-introduces-on-chain-withdrawals/).

drops.name: Bewitching Halloween
drops.creatorInfo: **Bishal** is a digital artist from India with over 4 years of experience. He likes to use his imagery and creative concepts to give the viewers a visual treat. He creates Photoshop compositions, dark and dramatic atmosphere define his work. He was the winner of MSI Creator Awards 2021 for Best Visual under the Graphic Design category. His works have been featured by Adobe Gen Create, Pixelsquid, Piximperfect, and Expert photography, etc. Also, he has conducted a workshop at IIT-B, one of the topmost renowned engineering institutes in India.
drops.description:
Halloween is a time to scare and thrill yourself and those around you, and to celebrate the spooky season of Halloween, here's a collection of dank, ominous images that will take you into the dark and the eerie.
 
Happy Howl-O-Ween!

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: Powers Of The Dark
drops.creatorInfo: **Martin Vanners** is known for his cinematic 3D renders, with dark and strong narratives. His work is part of several big NFT collections and has sold across the globe. His 15+ year career in photography can clearly be seen in the unique visual style of his current CG work.
drops.description:
According to ancient sources from Northern Europe, the month of October marks the beginning of the "powers of the dark". As the days become shorter and the nights become longer, the dark feeds on fear and unrest. For over a thousand years, northerners have been protecting themselves from the powers of the dark, by hanging a talisman by their front door. The NFT's from this drop serve as one of those talismans. The owner is advised to print the image, frame it, and position it as close to the front door as possible, for maximum security.

[Read more about Crypto.com NFT's HODLween Week lineup and preview the other Halloween collections on our blog.](https://medium.com/cryptocomnft/hodlween-week-lineup-announced-84fa566afe18)

drops.name: ORIGIN OF LIGHT
drops.creatorInfo: **Aron Visuals** is a well-known Digital Artist from North Macedonia that started creating art back in 2018.  He has worked with clients and companies from around the world. His work is supported and featured by Adobe and many more. From the moment he started creating, his life completely changed in every way that now he can't imagine living without it.
drops.description: Dare to enter and explore a new world, the greatest story of all: the truth of the unknown with hope that you can never get lost forever. Featuring 4 artworks from the Soul series created by **Aron Visuals** as a way to escape from reality and to enter his Imaginarium. Sometimes those who hit the darkest places are the same ones who shine the brightest light.

drops.name: Chromatic Memories
drops.creatorInfo: **Nathan Head**’s color-rich work captures the mundane in a refreshed nostalgic light. He is inspired by Korean pop music and its accompanying visuals, which is often reflected in his colorful oceans and snapshot-style cityscapes.
drops.description: An exploration into past memories through the vivid lens of Nathan Head. Dive into a plethora of colors and lose yourself.

drops.name: Crypto Cartel
drops.creatorInfo:
**Ari Hersch** is a self-taught artist born in Johannesburg, South Africa. Hersch attended the renowned Greenside Design Centre Collage where he received multiple awards and accolades on various architectural and design projects. After receiving his degree with distinction in Interior Architecture and Design, Hersch was headhunted by South African Architect and designer Mokena Makeka to work at his Cape Town based office. He has been passionate about art since a very young age after studying and learning about artists such as Gerard Sekoto, George Pemba and Ben Macala. His style, subject choice, and works are still heavily influenced by these masters today. He has had works featured in Group and solo exhibitions at key galleries and shows in South Africa, including Arts on Main and the Johannesburg Turbine Art Fair. 

Hersch cannot be confined to a single medium. He mixes formats, experiment with various materials, and constantly aim to innovate. His skill sets are constantly evolving while using a number of mediums such as pencil, pen, charcoal, watercolour, acrylic, oil paint and now digital. Hersch enjoys pushing the boundaries and is currently experimenting with the use of technology in the artistic space. He is working on a series of digital works that will be issued and released as NFT’s, “Non-Fungible Tokens” (a Blockchain technology) on major trading platforms.
drops.description:
Set in Cryptombia, The Crypto Cartel series tells the story of the growth and spread of the 4 largest Crypto cartels across the globe and attendant efforts of law enforcement the CEA, (Crypto Enforcement Agency) to meet them head-on in brutal, bloody conflict. It centers around the notorious Cryptombian Kingpin Pablo Etherbar.


This collection will feature 6 grand prize winners that will be selected at random at the end of the drop. Each of the 6 will receive $1000 USD of ETH. Only primary purchasers for the open editions and auction winners will be eligible to enter. 
- The NFT must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet before the drop ends.

drops.name: Entering the 10th Dimension
drops.creatorInfo:
**Melissa Vincent** is a self-taught, surreal artist based in Oxford, Mississippi. She has created dream-like visuals born from her Southern roots on an iPhone since 2011 which has lead her to press trips with National Geographic WILD, Northern Ireland to shoot Game of Thrones film locations, selling her art in brick and mortar galleries, as well as working with top brands such as Canon and McDonalds.

This is Melissa Vincent's second NFT Drop with all pieces created on iPhone over the past 5 years.
drops.description: Welcome to the 10th and final dimension. Here anything and everything imaginable is possible. You are one with the universe, an infinite body encompassing it all.
