At Crypto.com, we are on a mission to accelerate the world's transition to cryptocurrency.

drops.description:
They’re spooky, they’re cute, and they love to have a gourd time. To celebrate the bewitching season with the Crypto.com community, we’re dropping an irresistible collection of **Pumpkinmons**.

This drop features all the classic Halloween crypto critters, from “SkeleToken” to “FrankenFork”. One look and you’ll want to take home the entire squash squad. 

Users who collect different “Pumpkinmon” NFTs by 12 November 2021, 21:00 HKT have the chance to win a share of USD 100,000+ of CRO or an exclusive NFTs as part of the Pumpkin Sweepstakes! Visit our [**blog**](https://blog.crypto.com/the-halloween-mystery-pack/) to learn more.

drops.name: Æther
drops.creatorInfo: **Panos Pagonis** is a multidimensional creative with over 10 years of field experience in visual, music, and sound design projects. He brings to us his Origins collection, an exploration of primordial cultures re-imaged from a contemporary perspective.
drops.description:
Æther, Also known as the 5th element. The word αἰθήρ (aithḗr) in Homeric Greek means "pure, fresh air" or "clear sky".

In Greek mythology, it was thought to be the pure essence that the gods breathed, filling the space where they lived, analogous to the air breathed by mortals. In Medieval science, it was the elements that fills the region of the universe above the terrestrial sphere. In modern science, the name has taken a less fictional and more pragmatic meaning however its legacy is full of mystery and remains inspirational.

Æther or Ether has been the progenitor of the word “Etherium”. Perhaps the most prominent crypto-currency today,  created by Vitalik Buterin, it is second only to the “father” of all cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin. Etherium appears to be very ambitious and right now (2021) is on a wild rise. Only the future will tell how this will unfold, but the topic is on its own inspirational. The NFT Collection "*Æther*" is an artistic representation of the coin’s genesis.

This drop features 2 special NFT giveaways from the creator for anyone who meets the following requirements. 

For the first, any user who holds a collectible from one of Panos Pagonis’ previous drops, and has also purchased one or more collectibles from this drop will be eligible to receive a special edition NFT. 
- Both previous drop NFT and current drop NFT(s) must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet by the drop’s end. 
- Primary and secondary purchases are both valid 

For the second, any user who holds 3 or more unique collectibles from this drop will be eligible to receive a special edition NFT. 
- All NFT’s must be in your Crypto.com/NFT wallet by the drop’s end. 
- Primary and secondary purchases are both valid

drops.name: UFC 268
drops.creatorInfo: UFC® is the world’s premier mixed martial arts organization (MMA), with more than 625 million fans and 166 million social media followers. The organisation produces more than 40 live events annually in some of the most prestigious arenas around the world, while broadcasting to approximately 900M TV households across more than 175 countries. UFC’s athlete roster features the world’s best MMA athletes representing more than 70 countries.
drops.description:
The UFC® has partnered with Crypto.com to release its first-ever NFT collection, featuring fighters from one of the organisation’s most high-anticipated events of 2021: **UFC 268**. Taking place at Madison Square Garden in New York City on 6 November 2021, it’s headlined by two championship bouts: Usman vs. Covington for the Welterweight Champion title and Namajunas vs. Zhang for the Women’s Strawweight Champion title. 

Users who collect certain “UFC 268” NFTs before 7 November 2021, 13:00 UTC—either during the drop or in the Marketplace—will be automatically entered into the **UFC 268 Collection Sweepstakes**, where they can win exclusive UFC prizes. 

Don’t miss your chance to own a digital keepsake of your favourite fighter and a piece of UFC history. Shop the “UFC 268” collection now! 


### UFC 268 Collection Sweepstakes


Collectors who fulfill the **Requirements*** below by **7 November 2021, 13:00 UTC** will be automatically entered into the sweepstakes, where they can participate in all three draws. Please note that **owning more than one edition of the same collectible will not increase your chances** of winning, and each user is only eligible to win one prize from the sweepstakes. 

| Requirements* |  Prizes | Reward Type | # of Prizes |
|:--|:--| :--| :--|
| Collect all 3 UFC 268: Shards | UFC $50 Gift Card | Digital Prize | 50 |
| Collect a UFC 268: Digital Poster of one of the winners from the 3 bouts^ | 1-Year UFC Fight Pass Subscription| Digital Prize| 50|
| Own both UFC 268: Welterweight Belt Plate and the UFC 268: Digital Poster of the winner from the welterweight title bout^ | Exclusive UFC Belt | NFT | 50|
| Own both the UFC 268: Women’s Strawweight Belt Plate and the UFC 268: Digital Poster of the winner from the women’s strawweight title bout^ | Exclusive UFC Belt| NFT| 50|

**Please note that different editions of the same collectible only count as 1 collectible. To be eligible for the sweepstakes, make sure you own different collectibles (edition numbers don’t matter).*

*^Winners of these matches will be announced on 7 November 2021 after the end of the UFC 268 event.*

**The more unique UFC 268 collectibles you own, the higher your chances of winning!**

drops.name: Sons Of The Desert
drops.creatorInfo: **Abalastegui** is an illustrator & digital animator. In his pieces, he represents tribal and occult scenes and characters with a very colorful palette to give it strength. Influenced by classic animation and anime he tries to create dreamlike and mysterious scenes.
